Sleeve Kings was born out of a desire to do ONE THING WELL:  Card Sleeves.  Yes there are tons of card sleeve options out there but we wanted to create something new, a high-quality "standard" sleeve that was way better than any other, yet still affordable.  We have been involved to some degree in sleeves for over 8 years and bring a unique know-how to this business.
We have been very busy in 2020, we fulfilled the 1000+ backer rewards and have fulfilled more than 3,000 more shipments since then.  We have been actively selling previous seasons' sleeves but are back to step up our game and provide even more sleeves to you! 
This is the easy part!  This is the best time to get our sleeves, EVER!
 We have the latest bundles for today's most popular games! Looking for a specific game's sleeves?  Check the app above or look at our pre-bundled sleeve page HERE.  You can just fill in the # of games you want to sleeve (mostly 1) and it will tell you how many of each sleeve you need right at the top of the spreadsheet! 
We have the latest bundles for the hottest games & are adding weekly!
 Thicker Than Any Other "Standard" Sleeves  -Most "Standard" Sleeves are 40 microns thick, a few are even 50 microns.  Ours are 60 microns thick! That is 20-50% thicker than any other "Standard" Sleeve! You have a lot of choices in sleeving, why not choose the best?
 More affordable than other Premium Sleeves! While we aren't the thickest of the sleeves available, we are the only ones offering 110 sleeves per pack at a significantly more premium thickness.  FFG Sleeves (now discontinued!), Mayday Premium Sleeves and others are $2.50 to 3 per pack for just 50 sleeves, while ours are just $2.50 per pack for 110 sleeves, that is less than half the cost per sleeve!
 The "Clear" Winner -Our sleeves are made from Cleartech™ Polypropylene.  Our sleeves are made from 60 micron thick sheets which are demonstrably clearer than the other guys.  You can actually SEE the difference.  Just as diamonds are rated on a clarity scale, even 100% polypropylene can vary significantly from product to product depending on how it is manufactured.  You will see the difference!
The top sleeve is Sleeve Kings and the bottom is an FFG Sleeve. Notice the difference in clarity? You have to see it to believe it!
 10% More Sleeves Than The Other Guys -Standard sleeves come 100/pack.  We are the only brand offering 110 per pack!  10% more in every pack!
 Cheaper Than Other Brands  -Most brands retail for $3 per pack or more for only 40 or 50 sleeves.  We are offering ours for $2-3 per pack for 110 sleeves! 
 Buy Direct From The Manufacturer & Save!  -How are we able to offer these so cheap?  We ARE Sleeve Kings!  This is our brand!  We produce directly from the factory and sell directly to you.  There is no middleman!
 More Sizes!  It takes years for some brands to slowly add a size to their catalog, we started Season One with 20 sizes, increased that for Season 2, and have a total of 39 sizes for you for a truly HUGE selection!  For a list of games and what size sleeve fits what game, check BoardGameGeek HERE.  Many sleeve companies only offer a handful of sleeve sizes but we are going BIG and offering more for you!
 Cheapest you will ever find them!  If you check out the price per pack at the highest reward levels you will see the savings are huge!
 "Tough As Nails" Guarantee We have created these sleeves with the most advanced polypropylene processing in the industry.  This means importing our polypropylene already in the right sizes from the middle east and then cutting and sealing our sleeves at our factory in China before finally sending the rewards onto you.  We have a special process to make our sleeve actually warp/bend before they split in most cases!  Our sleeves simply will not split with regular use!  Just how tough are our sleeves?  We dare you to try the two finger challenge on any other brand of sleeves.  While some of ours may pull apart, the force required to do so is noticeably greater with our sleeves than with any other brand!
Click on this link to watch Cory compare these to Dragon Shield sleeves!

If you pledge for a reward from some other country and the shipping is more than 15% higher than what we are charging for Worldwide we will contact you and give you the option to pay the extra shipping or refund you and cancel your pledge. 
Why Kickstarter?
We have only been around a couple of years and are trying to increase our inventory and grow our customer base, but that is expensive and we have no idea how many of each type of sleeve to make. We need to see what the interest is and how many of each sleeve pack to produce, so we need your help! Without your help we simply won't exist!
Late Surveys
We will launch our survey system around Nov 15 as soon as the backer list from Kickstarter is complete. We will end the survey 3 months after the post-campaign survey opens though so if you want your shipment delayed past February 15, 2021 you'd better contact us and work that out. We don't mind holding your pledge a little longer but don't want people coming back a year after the campaign wondering where the sleeves are, you need to tell us what you want so we can deliver it.
Any pledges with no survey 90 days after we open the pledge manager (so after February 15, 2021, roughly) will be considered donations. We can't just hold on to hundreds of packs of sleeves for months on end waiting for you to decide what you might want.
 Yes, Kicktraq is amazing!!
Risks and challenges
While we are a fairly new company, we have a lot of experience in sleeves and board games. We have already delivered on two Kickstarter projects and our factory is ready to pull the trigger and just need funding to get the job done! We fully expect to deliver on time. Note that Season 2 fulfilled quite late due to a variety of reasons, which is why we delayed launching this project until it was fully fulfilled. Our other project Red Outpost is 95%+ fulfilled with the last few backers getting their stuff while this project is running. We are committed to making this our best project yet!

campaign.story:
Lie, cheat, steal, or simply play well to influence the next presidential election. It’s a game of risk and reward, involving scandals, animals, and all three colors of the American political spectrum.
On your turn, place three VOTER cards in front of you to create your voter map. 

Turns continue until someone has a map that contains three voters who share the same political affiliation in all four regions (undecideds are wild).

 Use RAT cards to spy, steal, or otherwise gain an advantage over your opponents. 

 But beware! For every RAT card you play, you must also draw a SCANDAL card, which contains a unique punishment.
 A SCANDAL is only revealed when a DIG card is played. The punishment of the SCANDAL may be devastating or just mildly annoying — the risk is yours to take!

The voter cards contain unique portraits, showing the rich diversity of characters that is this great nation.
Selecting the FiliBUSTer, Fat Cat, or Presidential tiers means YOUR portrait will be immortalized in MUD!
Just a few things to note...
 Your region, political leaning, and income bracket will be RANDOMIZED (no requests!)
 You don’t need to be an American citizen — all are welcome!
 Be of voting age, and please be human (no pets) 
We'll be asking you to take a reference photo with specific lighting, framing, and facial expression.
 While everyone who selects one of these three tiers will have their portrait put into the game, we hope that you'll opt to self identify. This is optional, but we ask because representation is important, and we’d love to produce a game that showcases the real diversity of our world. If you feel comfortable, please list your race, gender, age, and sexual orientation. None of this information will appear in the game; we just want to make a concerted effort to be as inclusive as possible.
Your portrait will appear in all copies of MUD — not just your copy.
Cradle your MUD in oak and wrap it in fine Crazy Horse leather. This is a one-of-kind item. Custom fit for your MUD deck (including scandal cards), this rugged yet elegant box is just what you need for transporting your game across the dynamic American landscape. Branded with MUD’s unique pigeon-rat emblem (etched right into the leather), you’ll feel like a true pioneer on your way to game night. Follow in the footsteps of great explorers like Sacagawea, Henry David Thoreau, or Kraven the Hunter, with this exclusive item. 
We the people of Pillbox Games, in Order to form a more perfect Game, establish just these, insure aesthetic quality, provide special additions, and secure the Blessings of our Backers’ choices, do ordain and establish these Stretch Goals…
 

                  --------------- TEHWESREECWRIELTLGBAEMAEN --------------- 
We love America, but that doesn’t mean we can’t poke fun at it, critique it, and even demand changes from it. While democracy is a wonderful thing at its core, choosing between two candidates — one red and one blue — year after year after year is just bonkers. It allows those with lots of money and power to manipulate the voters, pitting us against one another in a sinister game of “team sports.”
But this is both a call to action and a love letter to the nation!

                  MUD's artwork is a tapestry of Americana, drawing inspiration from vintage political cartoons, old ballots, masonic imagery, and federal currency.
Game play itself is peppered with nods to infamous moments in our shared history. Each scandal card alludes to an actual juicy news story that got the attention of people across the country. Some scandals will ring a bell from history class and others will be jaw-dropping moments that unfolded in real-time on Twitter.

We are an imperfect nation, but a beautiful one regardless.

Shipping will be charged AFTER THE END OF THE CAMPAIGN, during the “Pledge Manager” phase. Using BackerKit, you will be able to confirm your rewards, confirm your address, and finalize your order. 
For all “Customs Friendly” destinations, backers from these countries will not incur any customs fees.
We have included shipping estimates for some common geographical areas in the chart below. 
These are estimates and the actual costs of shipping could change based on many circumstances.
Backing for additional copies of the game will offer lower per-unit shipping costs.
The game will ship in 2021 and there is some uncertainty about how much global shipping will rise over the next year. We are dedicated to getting you the best possible value for shipping and are committed to shouldering a portion of the burden of shipping the game to you. We will provide customs friendly shipping to the USA, Canada, the EU, and Australia. Due to pandemic-related restrictions, we cannot currently offer shipping to India. 
We currently have our first game, Side Effects, in hobby stores nationwide. We want you to have access to MUD as well. Certified brick-and-mortar retailers interested in backing should submit our retail form on our website (www.pillboxgames.com/retail). When the campaign ends, we'll invite you to the pledge manager, in the meantime — back for any amount to stay up to date with our progress! 
We’re the creators of Side Effects (nominated for the 2019 SXSW Gamer’s Voice award)! Side Effects was funded on Kickstarter in 10 hours and went on to make over 600% of our goal. It’s a beautifully designed take-that style game, and MUD is its natural successor.
Jen Igartua lives everyday so that she can have stories to tell at Thanksgiving. Though unable to carry much of a tune, she loves doing musical improv (ugh over zoom now). She loves playing Overcooked and Fall Guys and is dreading the day that jumpsuits are no longer fashionable. She’s never had a peanut butter and jelly sandwich.
Jade Shames is a writer, musician, and game maker. Some of his proudest accomplishments include: writing himself into the X-Files canonical universe (X-Files: Secret Agendas), performing an entirely piano-instrumental version of Dark Side of the Moon at the Cité U in Paris, and co-founding this game company with his friends.
Kat Thek’s middle name is “Ann” but wouldn’t “And” be funnier? Her projects have been covered by NPR, CNN, and once, by a ten-year-old on YouTube. She loves making strange things with strange people. This is one of those things. 
Ben Bronstein is an illustrator, retoucher and designer. After graduating from RISD in 2009 majoring in illustration, he started working in the advertising world and makes games and draws other stuff by the moonlight. Ask him how many characters he has in elite smash right now or to tell you about Japanese knives and/or pens.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Shipping and fulfillment is the trickiest part of this campaign. With the worldwide pandemic, post offices in most countries are strained. But we're committed to doing our best to deliver your game. Still, it should be noted that some countries are having a harder time than others in terms of fulfillment, and prices are fluctuating. Check our shipping section for estimates, and do reach out with questions; we're happy to look up shipping for your specific address before you back.

Also, this is only our second game, and if we get the support we need, it could mean we’ll get to create many more, a lot faster. We all work full-time jobs outside of Pillbox, so it takes many long nights/weekends and a herculean effort to actually mass produce a new game. We’re hoping that after this campaign, we can truly scale up and legitimize our operations as a game company.

Here are just a few things we have on the horizon that a successful MUD campaign could produce:

* Side Effects expansion packs (including bonus cards)
* Amateur Alchemist (a version of Side Effects for the whole family, featuring old science experiments)
* Party games! (we’re developing a couple lighter, quicker, and more accessible games)
* The Other Town (part city simulator, part strategic battle game)
* Interactive game experiences (TBA)

If this campaign fails, however, it could spell the beginning of the end for Pillbox. We’re launching this with the support of our amazing fans (love you, numbskulls) and the goodwill we’ve built after launching our first game. But should that not be enough, it would be devastating.

We need your support to bring MUD to life and further our work as a game company!

campaign.story:
Le Jeu 5D, le jeu de cartes réinventé!

PLAY


 La plus importante innovation de l'histoire des cartes à jouer
IMPORTANT: La présentation en français alterne avec la présentation en anglais.
The Origin
It is 1997. I introduce my young daughters to card games. At the time, they were five and seven years old, respectively. I explain to my youngest that the Ace card sometimes plays the role of the «1» Card. She replies that her mother told her that letters are for writing words and numbers are for counting.
I try to explain to her that since there is only one pip, this card can be used as the «1» Card. Her sister, to facilitate everything, is quick to add that sometimes the Ace card is the strongest of the suit. My youngest daughter’s eyes stare at us as if we are aliens. She seems baffled by our totally crazy logic, and she tells me with all the assurance of a five year old. «Daddy, the «1» Cards are missing in your card deck».
What can a father do when faced with such a demonstration of consistency? Well yes! I decided that I needed to develop a deck of cards with the cards that the traditional deck lacks.
«Daddy, the «1» cards are missing in your card deck». « Papa, il manque des Cartes « 1 » dans ton jeu de cartes »
L’ORIGINE
Nous sommes en 1997, j’initie mes jeunes filles au jeu de cartes. À l’époque elles sont respectivement âgées de cinq et sept ans. J’explique à ma plus jeune que la Carte As joue parfois le rôle de la Carte «1», elle me répond que sa mère lui a dit que les lettres servaient à écrire des mots et les chiffres servaient à compter.
J’essaie de lui expliquer que comme il n’y a qu’un seul symbole, cette carte peut servir de Carte «1». Sa sœur, pour faciliter le tout s’empresse d’ajouter que certaines fois la Carte As est la plus forte du jeu. Les yeux de ma fille cadette nous dévisagent comme si nous étions des extra-terrestres, elle semble déconcertée par notre logique totalement loufoque et elle me déclare avec toute l’assurance de ses cinq ans, «papa, il manque des Cartes «1» dans ton jeu de cartes».
Que peut faire un père devant une telle démonstration de cohérence? Eh bien oui! J’ai décidé qu’il fallait que je développe un jeu de cartes avec les cartes qui manquent au jeu traditionnel.
Concept Summary    /    Résumé du concept
A Fifth Suit - The Stars    /    Une Cinquième Famille - Les Étoiles
The Star symbol was chosen to represent a fifth Suit, the Stars.
 Le symbole d’Étoile a été choisi pour illustrer une cinquième Famille, les Étoiles.
Five Suits  -  Five Colors    /    Cinq Familles  -  Cinq Couleurs
With five distinctive Colors, playing cards become more beautiful, more eye-catching, clearer and more defined.
Avec cinq Couleurs distinctives, les cartes deviennent plus belles, plus attirantes, plus claires et mieux définies.
The Return of the «1 » Card / Le retour de la Carte «1»
The return of the « 1 » Card completes the elementary arithmetic sequence and makes it easier for children to understand.
Le retour de la Carte «1» complète la suite arithmétique élémentaire et facilite la compréhension par les enfants.
Aces Show Dominance  /  Des As aux allures dominantes
Ace Cards are displayed with large symbols, any ambiguity with Aces is eliminated.
Les Cartes As s’affichent avec de gros symboles, toute ambiguïté avec les As est éliminé.
Welcome to The Princess Card / Bienvenue à la Carte Princesse
The arrival of the Princess Card completes the Royal Court and brings panache to the card game.
L’arrivée de la Carte Princesse complète la Famille Royale et apporte du panache au jeu de cartes.
The new Princess Card highlights equality between the female and male Face Cards.
La présence de la nouvelle Carte Princesse engendre l’équité entre les Cartes Figures féminines et masculines.
5 Different Jokers  /  5 Jokers différents
The forgotten Jokers will now be more involved in the action.
LeS Jokers, ces grands oubliés seront dorénavant plus impliqués dans l’action.
The New Card « 81 » / La nouvelle Carte «81»
With all the mystical coherence that Card « 81 » brings, the 5D Deck reaches full maturity.
Avec toute la cohérence mystique qu’apporte la Carte « 81 », le Jeu 5D atteint sa pleine maturité.
An Unexpected Graphic Challenge 
 Un défi graphique insoupçonné 
The Approach / L’approche
The 5D Deck respects tradition. Court Cards are inspired by the « Portrait de Paris ».
Le Jeu 5D respecte la tradition, des personnages inspirés du « Portrait de Paris »
The 5D Deck's indexes are influenced by the « English Pattern »
Les indices du Jeu de cartes 5D sont influencés par le « English Pattern »
Like most European decks, 5D Deck’s indexes appear in all four corners.
 Comme la majorité des jeux européens, les indices du Jeu 5D apparaissent aux quatre coins.
An Artist up to the Task / Un artiste à la hauteur
It is a true masterpiece of illustration by the Canadian artist Elie Miron
Elie Miron, St-Jérome, Québec, Canada
C’est un véritable chef-d’œuvre d’illustration que réalisa l’artiste Canadien Élie Miron.
The Ingenious Harmony of Symbols
PLAY

 L'Harmonie ingénieuse des symboles 
PLAY

The Hierarchy of Suits    /    La Hiérarchie des Familles
The characters in the Suit of Spades evoke the Stone Age. 
 Les personnages de la Famille des Piques évoquent l’Âge de Pierre.
The cards in the Suit of Clubs are illustrated with characters from The Antiquity.  
Les cartes de la Famille des Trèfles sont illustrées par des personnages de l’Antiquité.
The cards in the Suit of Diamonds can be recognized by the features of characters from the Middle Ages. 
Les cartes de la Famille des Carreaux se reconnaissent sous les traits de personnages du Moyen-Âge. 
The cards in the Suit of Hearts are associated with characters from the Modern Era.
Les cartes de la Famille des Cœurs sont associées à des personnages de l’Ère moderne. 
 Finally, characters from the Future emerged to represent the Star Suit.
Finalement, des personnages du Futur se sont imposés pour représenter la Famille des Étoiles.
The Hypocrite Cards / Les cartes Hypocrites
Presented in profile, the four Hypocrite Cards bring visual variety and new concepts of Games.
Présentées de profil, les quatre Cartes Hypocrites apportent de la variété visuelle et des nouveaux concepts de jeux.
COMPLETE DESCRIPTION OF REWARDS
IMPORTANT: La suite de la présentation en français suit la présentation en anglais.

Playing cards for the purpose of playing
With any pledge, all backers will receive the rules of three different games. These rules will be sent by email.
GAME 15 :  An evolution type game. This game allows you to quickly become familiar with the new structure of fifteen cards of the 5D Deck. GAME 15 is simple, accessible to all and leads to basic mathematics. It can be played with two or more players.
TRIO :  Matching Cards game types are very popular. For many of you I strike a chord when I refer to Canasta or Rummy.  These games are some of the most played around the world.  The game TRIO is a simple Matching Cards game, but it can be played new and different ways. TRIO can be played with two or more players.
TRIX : One of the most popular kinds of games that we found «true» card players are into is the Trick-Taking type of games.  There are hundreds of different Trick-Taking games including Bridge, 500, and Hearts to name a few, which have many followers around the world.  TRIX is a great way to introduce a novice to this type of game.  This is probably the only Trick-Taking game in existence that is played with two players. It can also be played with three players. Do not be too quick to judge, TRIX is not trivial. It is challenging and demonstrates how increasing the number of cards in the 5D Deck is such a huge attribute.
5D Deck International Version « 81 » with 2 Different Colored Backs
If you are contributing for one deck of cards, you will have a choice of red or black backing. If you contribute for two decks, you will receive one of each Color.
The Economical Approach
The approach is to give you the deck of cards with a folded card box and five separate stacks of cards. Everything is inserted into an envelope to considerably reduce delivery costs. You can easily assemble the box and then store your cards in the traditional way.
In addition to being economical, this approach will introduce you to the 5D Game, Suit by Suit and probably Card by Card. Even before you have discovered the whole set, you will be seduced, we are convinced.
A Special Gift
You want to contribute to our campaign and help us bring the new 5D Deck to life all over the planet. You are not a fan of playing cards, but you know people around you who are. Offer the 5D Deck in an economical version to a person or persons of your choice. Your shipment will be personalized and mailed out directly as per your wishes.
You can choose between two different original presentations.
· The « THANK YOU » presentation!
· The « OLD QUEBEC During the Holidays » presentation!
In both cases, we will be able to identify the sender as well as the recipient of your gift.
You will be able to offer the choice of one set with red backing, or two sets with one red and one black. The people to whom you offer the 5D Deck will also receive the rules for the three following games: GAME 15, TRIO and TRIX.  Once the campaign has successfully been completed, we will send you a form to get all the details concerning your gifts.
The Complete Set
In The Complete Set you will receive two 5D Decks (one of each color) and a booklet of five rules of five new games. This combined with the three games rules sent to all project backers by email, will give you a grand total of eight exclusives new games rules that will allow you to experience the full potential of 5D Games.
The Complete Set makes a wonderful gift for any occasion. As with the Economy Set, we will personalize these shipments and mail them directly to your desired location.
The Collector Set
In the Collector Set, we have added to the Complete Set, a package whose backing is specially laminated with gold colored foil.  This finish will give a lavish look to your game and will be an exclusive item in your collection.
Only 500 units will be put into circulation and this product will never be reissued. Each Collector Set is accompanied by a magnificent numbered certificate of authenticity. These are assigned sequentially according to the order dates.
The inside of the boxes are also stamped with the "Special Collector" seal. Contributors who purchase “Collector Sets” will also receive a personalized postcard handwritten by the designer. (See text below, "Personalized Token of Appreciation").
You are a Great Collector! Consult the “Great Collector” section, a surprise awaits you!
Great Collector Set
Not only are you a collector, but you like to stand out and display your contribution to our project with splendor. The « Uncut Sheet » which measures 30’’ X 40 ‘’ is your ideal reward! You can frame it according to your taste and showcase it in your favorite spot.
Only 81 copies of the « Uncut Sheet » will be withdrawn from the printing batches and these 81 numbered sheets will be affixed with a distinctive seal of authenticity. A card with each back bearing the same seal, as well as a specific header montage drawn by the illustrator of the 5D Deck, our great artist Élie Miron, will be part of this set.
With the addition of these three elements, the «Great Collector» will now have a clearly identified and prestigious presentation of our « Uncut Sheet ».  This « Uncut Sheet » will be delivered in a quality, protective tube.
Multiple Sets
Backers who wish to get multiple decks of cards can choose from the different options that are offered. 
Half-brick: 4 decks of cards    Brick: 8 decks of cards    Double-brick: 16 decks of cards
Half-box: 32 decks of cards   Box: 64 decks of cards
2 boxes: 128 decks of cards   4 boxes: 256 decks of cards
Note that no matter how many sets are ordered, Multiple Sets will always consist of 50% red back card decks, and 50% black back cards decks. All Multiple Sets are delivered in traditional tuck boxes.
Personalized Token of Appreciation
All American and Canadian Backers who confirm a pledge on Friday, September 25th will receive a personalized postcard featuring the playing card of the backer’s choice. For backers from other countries, this offer will run until midnight on September 26th.
Conclusion
The 5D Deck has been on my mind for several years. The traditional deck of cards has been the subject of much research including the testing of various games. Some exceptional and highly regarded games that I have developed have been played on prototypes for years. I intend, over time, to introduce them to you so that you can appreciate them.
For this International Launch, I have added the Card « 81 », a new card that will be particularly important.  I also asked my talented comrade in arms, Elie Miron, to graphically touch up certain cards and I have concocted some new original games that I am sure you will have fun with.
The Kickstarter community of backers is a highly active group and involved in the world of playing cards. I appeal to card players, collectors, educators, and parents who will quickly identify all the educational and playful potential and who will agree to help give momentum to the 5D Deck. 
PRÉSENTATION DES RÉCOMPENSES ET FORFAITS
Des cartes à jouer pour jouer!
Avec n'importe laquelle des récompenses, les contributeurs recevront les règles de trois nouveaux jeux. Ces règles seront envoyées par courrier électronique.
JEU 15 : Un jeu de type évolution.  Ce jeu permet de se familiariser rapidement avec la nouvelle structure de quinze cartes de chacune des Familles du Jeu 5D.  JEU 15 est un jeu simple, accessible à tous et qui entraîne aux mathématiques de base.  Il peut être joué à deux joueurs ou plus.
TRIO : Les jeux de Combinaison sont très prisés. Si je vous parle de Canasta ou de Rummy, pour plusieurs d’entre vous je touche une corde sensible. Ces jeux sont parmi les plus populaires. Le jeu TRIO est un jeu de montage de série simple, mais qui fait appel à de nouvelles façons de jouer. TRIO peut être joué à deux joueurs ou plus.
TRIX : Parmi les types de jeu les plus appréciés chez les «vrais» joueurs de cartes, on retrouve les jeux de levées. Il existe des centaines de jeux de levées différents. Le Bridge, le 500, les Cœurs pour ne nommer que ceux-ci comptent de nombreux fidèles dans le monde. Le Jeu TRIX est une excellente façon d’initier un profane aux jeux de levées. C’est probablement le seul jeu de levées qui existe qui se joue à deux joueurs.  Il peut aussi être joué à trois joueurs. Ne jugez pas trop vite, TRIX n’est pas banal. Il représente un défi intéressant et vous fera découvrir comment l’augmentation du nombre de cartes dans le Jeu 5D est un énorme attribut.
Jeu 5D Version International « 81 » offert avec deux couleurs d’endos.
Si vous contribuez pour un paquet de cartes, vous aurez le choix entre les endos de couleur rouge ou noir. Si vous contribuez pour deux paquets, vous en recevrez un de chaque couleur.
L’approche économique
L’approche consiste à vous offrir le paquet de cartes avec une boîte de cartes pliée et en cinq piles de cartes distinctes. Le tout est inséré dans une enveloppe afin de réduire considérablement les frais de livraison. Vous pourrez facilement assembler la boîte et par la suite ranger vos cartes de façon traditionnelle.
En plus d’être économique, cette approche vous fera découvrir le Jeu 5D Famille par Famille et probablement carte par carte. Avant même d’avoir découvert l’ensemble au complet, vous serez séduits, nous en sommes convaincus.
Un cadeau spécial
Vous désirez contribuer à notre campagne et nous aider à faire vivre le nouveau Jeu 5D partout sur la planète. Vous n’êtes pas un adepte des cartes à jouer, mais vous connaissez des gens de votre entourage qui le sont. Offrez le Jeu 5D en version économique à la personne ou aux personnes de votre choix. Nous le ferons parvenir directement et votre envoi sera personnalisé par nous et posté par nous aussi directement chez cette personne si c’est votre désir.
Vous pourrez choisir entre deux présentations originales différentes.
· La présentation MERCI!
· La Présentation VIEUX QUÉBEC dans le temps des fêtes.
Dans les deux cas, nous pourrons identifier à qui le cadeau est destiné et qui offre le cadeau.
Vous pourrez offrir au choix un jeu avec endos rouge ou deux jeux avec un de couleur rouge et un de couleur noire. Les personnes à qui vous offrez le Jeu 5D recevront aussi les règles des trois jeux offerts, soient : JEU 15, TRIO et TRIX.
Lorsque la campagne sera terminée avec succès, nous vous ferons parvenir un questionnaire pour obtenir toutes les précisions concernant votre ou vos cadeaux.
L’Ensemble complet
L'Ensemble complet comprend deux jeux de cartes (un de chaque couleur) et un livret de règles de cinq nouveaux jeux supplémentaires. Ce livret sera inséré dans le coffret. Combinés avec les trois règles de jeux envoyés à tous par courrier électronique, vous vous retrouverez donc avec huit règles de nouveaux jeux exclusifs qui vous permettront de découvrir tout le potentiel du Jeu 5D.
Notez que vous pouvez aussi offrir l’Ensemble complet en cadeau, comme pour les Ensembles Économiques, nous personnaliserons ces envois et les posterons directement à l’endroit que vous nous indiquerez.
 L’Ensemble Collectionneur
Dans l'Ensemble Collectionneur, nous avons ajouté à l’Ensemble Complet un paquet dont les endos sont spécialement recouverts d’une feuille dorée thermo plastifié. Ce fini qui donnera une allure grandiose à votre jeu sera une pièce de choix dans votre collection.
Seulement 500 unités seront mises en circulation et jamais ce produit ne sera réédité. Chaque Ensemble Collectionneur est accompagné d’un magnifique certificat d’authenticité numéroté. Ceux-ci sont attribués dans l’ordre selon les dates de commande.
L’intérieur des boîtes est aussi estampé du sceau «Spécial Collectionneur». Les contributeurs qui se procureront les «Ensemble Collectionneur» recevront aussi une carte postale personnalisée écrite à la main par le concepteur. (Voir texte plus loin «Marque d’appréciation personnalisée».
Vous êtes un Grand Collectionneur!  Consultez la section «Grand Collectionneur», une surprise vous attend!
 L’Ensemble Grand Collectionneur
Non seulement vous êtes collectionneur, mais vous aimez vous distinguer, et souhaitez afficher avec splendeur votre contribution à notre projet. La «Feuille de Presse» non coupée qui mesure 25’’ x 30 ‘’ est la récompense idéale! Vous pourrez l’encadrer selon vos goûts et la mettre en évidence à un endroit de choix.
Seulement 81 exemplaires des « Feuilles de Presse » seront retirés des lots d’impression. Sur ces 81 feuilles numérotées sera apposé un sceau d’authenticité distinctif. Une carte de chaque endos portant ce même sceau, ainsi qu’un montage entête spécifique dessiné par l’illustrateur du Jeu 5D, notre grand artiste Élie Miron, seront joints à l’envoi.
Ces trois éléments supplémentaires permettront au « Grand Collectionneur » une présentation identifiée et prestigieuse de votre «Feuille de Presse» non coupée. La «Feuille de Presse» sera livrée dans un tube de protection de qualité.
Les Ensembles Multiples
Les contributeurs qui désirent obtenir plusieurs paquets de cartes peuvent choisir parmi les différentes options qui sont offertes. 
Demi-brique : 4 paquets de cartes   Brique : 8 paquets de cartes
Double-brique : 16 paquets de cartes   Demi-caisse : 32 paquets de cartes
Caisse : 64 paquets de cartes  2 caisses : 128 paquets de cartes
4 caisses : 256 paquets de cartes
Notez que peu importe la quantité commandée, les Ensembles Multiples seront toujours composés de 50 % de paquets de cartes à endos rouges et 50 % à endos noirs. Tous les Ensembles Multiples sont livrés en boîtes de jeu traditionnelles.
Marque d’Appréciation Personnalisée
Tous les contributeurs Américains et Canadiens qui confirmeront une contribution le vendredi 25 septembre recevront une carte postale personnalisée à l’effigie de la carte à jouer au choix du contributeur, et ce peu importe la récompense soutenue. Pour les contributeurs de d’autres pays, cette offre sera tenue jusqu’à minuit le 26 septembre.
Conclusion
Le Jeu de Cartes 5D existe dans mon esprit depuis plusieurs années. Le jeu de cartes a fait l’objet de nombreuses recherches et de nombreux tests de différents jeux. Certains jeux exceptionnels et très appréciés que j’ai développés se jouent sur des prototypes depuis des années. J’ai l’intention avec le temps, de vous les faire découvrir et de vous les faire apprécier.
Pour ce Lancement International, j’ai ajouté la Carte « 81 », une nouvelle carte qui aura toute son importance. J’ai aussi demandé à mon talentueux compagnon d’armes, Élie Miron, de retoucher graphiquement certaines cartes. Il en a profité pour «designer » de nouveaux endos spécifiques à cette édition. Je vous ai aussi concocté quelques nouveaux jeux inédits qui sauront j’en suis convaincu vous plaire et vous amuser.
La communauté de contributeurs de Kickstarter est un groupe déjà très actif et impliqué dans le monde de la carte à jouer. Je fais appel aux joueurs de cartes, aux collectionneurs, aux éducateurs et aux parents qui sauront rapidement déceler tout le potentiel éducatif et ludique et qui accepteront de contribuer à donner cet élan au Jeu 5D.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
RISKS AND CHALLENGES (Version française à la fin)

Producing a deck of cards does not represent a great technological challenge, especially since the production is entrusted to Cardston, a printing company specializing in the field of playing cards. The real challenge for us will be to ensure that the multiple shipments are delivered quickly, as we assume that some will be destined for toys & games stores. From then on, our goal is that all private mailing be posted before the end of November 2020.

Most of the private correspondence will be mailed in envelopes. We are confident that everyone will receive their rewards for the holiday season. To avoid any production delays, we have limited the type and number of bonuses for our backers. We do not offer medals, T-shirts, or caps etc.
For this first campaign, we are focused on the playing card products including the ‘Collector’ and « Press Sheet » versions. The « Thank You » and « Old Quebec » mailing cards will be pre-addressed. They will be also manufactured by a specialized supplier that we know well.
We will pay special attention to detail, and in a prompt manner, when receiving the information and the choices from our contributors. We therefore intend to quickly establish a frequent relationship with them, and we will regularly sensitize them on the importance of providing us with the required information promptly. We will also constantly update them on the progress so that they can share with us all the fun and enthusiasm of the International 5D Deck launch!

RISQUES ET DÉFIS

Produire un jeu de cartes ne représente pas un grand défi technologique, d’autant plus que la production est confiée à la compagnie Cardston qui est un imprimeur spécialisé dans le domaine de l’impression de cartes à jouer. Le défi réel pour nous sera de s’assurer que les envois multiples soient livrés rapidement, car nous présumons que certains serviront à des magasins de jeux et jouets. Par la suite, notre objectif est que tous les envois privés aient été postés avant la fin du mois de novembre 2020. 
La majorité des envois privés s’effectueront par la poste en enveloppes. Nous sommes persuadés que tous auront reçu leurs récompenses pour le temps des fêtes. C’est d’ailleurs pour éviter tout retard dans la production que nous avons limité les éléments de gratifications pour nos contributeurs. Nous n’offrons pas de médailles, T-shirt ou casquettes, etc. 
Pour cette première campagne, nous nous sommes concentrés sur le produit cartes à jouer y incluant la version ‘Collectionneur’ et « Feuille de Presse ». Pour les Cartes d’envoi «Merci» et « Vieux Québec », elles seront préadressées et sont aussi fabriquées par un fournisseur spécialisé que nous connaissons bien. 
Nous apporterons une attention toute particulière afin de recevoir rapidement et avec grande précision les choix et informations de nos contributeurs. Nous avons donc l’intention d’établir rapidement une relation fréquente avec ceux-ci et nous allons les sensibiliser régulièrement à l’importance de nous fournir les renseignements rapidement. Nous les informerons aussi constamment de l’évolution de notre projet afin qu’ils partagent avec nous tout le plaisir et l’enthousiasme du Lancement International du Jeu 5D!

updates.update_userinfo: PDF TRIX GAME / PDF JEU TRIX
updates.update_content:
PDF TRIX GAME
We are pleased to annonce that in principle you have all received the TRIX Game PDF by email today. The TRIO and GAME 15 Games PDFs will also be emailed to you inthe next few days. If you have not received this PDF, please check your spam folder.
WE will also begin to sort out individual issues for those who have other matters to deal with. So If you have not received your reward, if it is incomplete, or if it is not in perfect condition, please notify us by return email upon sending the PDF we just sent you.

On December 31st, we finally finished delivering the Kickstarter campaign rewards. All rewards were dispatched between December 14th and December 31st. We are sorry for the delays that appeared at the end of the journey. These were largely due to the pandemic and generalized lockdowns. We bear full responsibility.
We also know that our initiative to divide the card game into sections and send it out in envelopes was not the greatest idea. Most of those who ordered one or two sets received it in bad condition. If this is your case, we apologize and will try to find a way to make it up to you. On the other hand, if your deck of cards is not in perfect condition, let us know. We will replace it for you.

It is certainly not easy to finish up a project requiring the involvement & coordination of several stakeholders, particularly in the context of a pandemic! Half a day’s delay here, two days late there, unplanned out-of-stock products! In short, we will get there anyway! We apologize for the few days of delay. At the beginning of the week, we start with deliveries to specialized stores. This will take two days to complete and will be followed by private deliveries.
As a result of the reduced number of planned holiday gatherings due to the pandemic, many folks have asked us if we can ship additional card decks or games & rules books directly to persons of their choice.

updates.update_content: OOPS! The French Canadian Guy wanted to go too fast! – TAKE 2 - As you can see, the 5D Playing Card Decks are ready! All that’s missing are the boxes and the booklet of rules. Looking forward to getting back to you in a few days with more great news!

updates.update_content: As you can see, the 5D playing card Decks are ready! All that’s missing are the boxes and the booklets of rules. Looking forward to getting back to you in a few days with more Great news!

You were 317 backers to trust me, 317 faithful believers including 128 from 30 countries other than my own to ensure that my project could take off. Wow… I think it is quite impressive!

As I mentioned a few times, this international Launch of the 5D Deck was just the first step.  Several more games will follow and the future of the 5D Games looks very promising. As objectively as possible, I want to testify as to how successfully the Kickstarter platform allows creators like myself to bring their projects to life and how it makes our dreams a reality.

updates.update_userinfo: THE DRAFTING OF THE RULES IS WELL UNDER WAY / LA RÉDACTION DES RÈGLES VA BON TRAIN
updates.update_content:
As you know, the international launch of the 5D Deck comes with the publication of the rules for 8 new games. One of the essential conditions for the enjoyment of a game is the simplicity and clarity of its rules. You will notice that the rules of all games developed by 5D meet very high-quality standards.
Rules that are clear and simple, a uniform language, a structured presentation including icons, images and examples. In short, everything to make the card game even more interesting! The quality of our game rules will always be one of our top priorities.

updates.update_userinfo: THE NEW 5D DECK IS READY TO PRINT / LE NOUVEAU JEU 5D PRÊT À ÊTRE IMPRIMÉ
updates.update_content:
Dear backers, I am pleased to announce that as of October 9th, 2020, all touch ups, modifications, and additions to the 5D Deck are complete.  In the photo we can see the talented graphic designer Élie Miron making the changes on the last card to be touched up, the Joker of Clubs.
All 81 cards are now finalized, and the backs are completed. The files will be transferred to our printer.  As soon as we confirm the quantities, the presses will start rolling! The scheduled date is Monday, October 26th.

updates.update_userinfo: THE SELECTION HAS BEEN MADE / LES CHOIX SONT FAITS
updates.update_content:
Right from the start, the game selection for which we will provide the rules in PDF format had been made. You will receive GAME 15, a simple Evolution game. TRIO, a Matching Cards type game with a lot of action and TRIX, a remarkably interesting Trick Taking game designed to be played with two or three players.
However, I had not yet decided on the five games that would make up the Complete Set. In my game inventory, there were about 20 that were considered.  I was influenced by the present health crisis and subsequent lack of socialisation so, I decided to introduce a set which includes three Solitaire games, an adaptation of a well-known Evolution game, the SUPER 8, and an interesting Trick Taking game, DECATHLON.

We tell our story on Singapore national TV in a short 7-minute feature! We were a little cringe-y but the production team did an excellent effort - thank you Sebas and team!
 Why Kickstarter?
1. Because we completely sold out all 6000 units previously and we need your support in order to do another round of manufacturing!
2. Because Kickstarter is awesome for small teams like us and we really enjoy engaging and hearing feedback/suggestions from you all through the journey!
We are working with the same manufacturing partners as our first campaign. Idealhard and Whatz Games! We had a good experience working with them and got great feedback on component quality. 
If anybody needs a contact, let us know! We highly recommend them :)
Here is our estimated timeline. We will be writing regular updates to inform you of our design, manufacturing and shipping milestones!

The whole of January is dedicated to ensuring that there are no mistakes in the samples from our manufacturing and that the foil cards will look exactly as we want them. Freight deliveries usually take around 2 months from the factory and we've decided to do fulfillment this way because it makes shipping cheaper for everyone.
*All Backers from our first campaign will get a $8.88 SGD shipping credit in their  Crowdox account. Please remember to use the same email address you used for the first campaign!
Estimated Shipping Rates
Shipping will be calculated and CHARGED AFTER THE CAMPAIGN (via CrowdOx) according to your destination and total order size. This project will be EU, Canada, China, US and Australia friendly!
Shipping will be expensive in the current climate and nobody is happy about that. We will do our best to ensure high quality fair shipping prices for each backer.We will be working with well-vetted partners in each region who have experience with Kickstarter reward fulfillment.


In these estimated rates, we have tried to subsidize the import taxes and duties as much as we can. We make no money at all from shipping (and probably will take a small loss) so the estimates also include a slight buffer just in case anything happens.
 The final rates which could be slightly higher or lower will be determined in Crowdox after the campaign.
First Kickstarter - Lessons and Loose Ends
We've learnt lots from our first Kickstarter. We understand the manufacturing and logistics supply chain better now, as well as what to look out for when working with different partners along the supply chain. From the data and feedback, we believe we've done well and fulfilled over 99% of the pledges for the first Kickstarter successfully and on time as we promised.
Still, we had some manufacturing decisions and mistakes that were rather costly for us. That is why even though the game play design and component decisions are almost 100% done, we've left more time for ourselves in the KS timeline this time round to ensure that the components produced will be exactly how we want it.
There are 2 issues with the previous KS campaign that we now have an opportunity (because of the second KS) to address:
 Sleeves were poker-sized but cards were bridge-sized: Please opt in here at this link. We will send you free poker-sized cards for your game so that they can fit the sleeves you ordered. This only applies to returning backers who ordered extra sleeves.
 Rulebook didn't fit the piano box: The new rulebook will fit in the piano box comfortably, even with the sleeves. Please back the lowest tier and you'll get access to the pledge manager where you can order just the rulebook. You will only be charged for shipping.
For Augmented Backers of the first campaign who have not received your personalized cards, either you have not sent in your required images and information or Keith is still working hard on the designs. 
This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $460M raised between them.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We've delivered successfully on our first Kickstarter, gone to multiple conventions and had a very successful period of online sales before we sold out. In terms of our planning and execution, we have mostly made changes that optimized the project or rectified previous mistakes so we are more prepared for uncertainty and possible challenges. In terms of the foil cards, there is a risk that our foil designs are too idealistic but that is why we have given ourselves an extra month in the timeline for QC and sample approval to ensure that we are satisfied with the end result. 

In the event that the pandemic or an unseen global event causes disruptions to the manufacturing and logistics line, we will communicate our situation and decisions to all backers with consistent, transparent and clear updates.

Our plan is to get the game in your hands by June 2021. No doubt there will be complications along the way — there always are — but we feel more well-equipped to handle them than compared to the first campaign. We have great confidence in our manufacturer, freight shippers, and fulfillment centers to get the job done right.

We intend to do further Kickstarter projects and our credibility and track record are very important to us. We take all feedback and suggestions sincerely. You can contact us anytime at hello@lordofthechords.com.

REFUND POLICY

We can refund you within 14 days of the campaign’s end, fees included. After that, we have a policy of no questions asked, though that’s minus Kickstarter and payment processing fees (which we can’t get back from them after 14 days). However, if we’ve begun packaging your pledge for shipment, no refunds are possible. If a component cannot be delivered AT ALL, we refund that completely, including fees.

All refunds after the 14 days close of the campaign may be processed via PayPal or reversed via Stripe to your credit card at our discretion. Refunds within 14 days are reversed via Stripe to your credit card.


TERMS AND CONDITIONS

By pledging to this project, you acknowledge that the final look, materials and content of the rewards (and the project) are subject to change and may differ substantially from what is presented while the Kickstarter project was active.

Our expected date of fulfillment is June 2021 and we will work as hard as we can to make it happen. However, delays can happen and this is not a definite guarantee.

If you do not log in and confirm your pledge within 8 weeks of our notification via email to confirm your pledge, you agree that we have fulfilled our obligations to you in full for payment or donations received. However, we may, at our discretion, refund or ship your pledge if you contact us and confirm your pledge after the 8 week window has elapsed. Unconfirmed pledges make it difficult for us to plan production and logistics, and in the past have led to project delays. For this project we do not intend to allow this to happen, which may mean if you confirm your pledge too late, exclusive items may not be produced in sufficient quantity for your pledge.

If you confirm your pledge within 8 weeks of our notification via email, you agree that our responsibility to you is to ship your order as entered into our pledge manager system, that title and risk passes to you upon delivery to a common carrier for such shipment, and you are responsible for import duties or any other duties that may be payable to the relevant tax authorities, providing correct address information and ensuring this address is deliverable by normal methods. We regret we are unable to ship to PO Boxes.

All deliveries will be tracked and you will be sent a shipping number. If the tracking history shows that it was delivered but you did not receive it, it is not our responsibility to reship you one. We will approach these situations on a case-by-case basis and where you might have to pay a minimal amount to cover the reshipment fee.

All backers that have selected “No Reward” on Kickstarter, that wish to receive a reward for this campaign, must make sure to confirm their order by the Pledge Manager Deadline. We will announce the date for this once the Pledge Manager becomes live. All “No Reward” pledges will be treated as donations once the Pledge Manager Deadline has passed.

If you open your game and see that something is missing or broken, we will work hard to get you replacement parts and make things right. Simply contact us at hello@lordofthechords.com.
Note: This does not cover accidental damage, theft, loss, or any other event that is not a manufacturing defect.

campaign.story:
GEMJI is a tabletop game engine that gives you the freedom to play multiple games. Currently, we start with over 30 games and 7 building models. Games include original titles developed by the GEMJI team, educational games, and popular classic game adaptations. The mathematical possibilities in 2D and 3D give you plenty of room to create & publish your own games on the platform.

Precision and design meet in each tile. Its features & modularity make it an extremely versatile building block for exploring new game concepts & entertainment moments.

With a magnetic personality and smart features, GEMJI dares you to reimagine your way of thinking about games. Take part in a new tabletop game Revolution!




Just like a standard deck of cards, the GEMJI System offers multiple games in one set. The big difference is that GEMJI could be used in many more situations and combinations, which means MORE games! The magnetic grid, the double-face tactile interface, the unique design language, and 3D build options make GEMJI unbeatable.




The dog running around won't destroy your GEMJI battlefield. Nor the wind. Nor the moving boat. GEMJI adds fun to your indoor and outdoor activities and can be played solo or with a group.


The modular nature of the system allows a huge variety of games. With a sprinkle of creativity, you can adapt or reinvent classical games, learn new concepts, master new skills, or play by your own rules and share your games with the GEMJI Community.  Look at the table at the bottom of the campaign for exact titles and parameters for the different games. Here are the main categories: 








The team got wild with the box design. And honestly, we couldn’t pick just one! That’s why we leave that decision to you - vote for your favorite box cover art now. The most popular choice will determine the final look of our “Light” pledge option. 
Here is how people from SPIEL 2019 reacted to GEMJI.
PLAY



GEMJI is also a magnetic constructor to build your dreams. No matter if it’s a 2D or a 3D shape, you got it!

GEMJi can be a fidget to relax because taking care of your inner peace is just as important as growing your creativity.
From a toy to play with, GEMJI easily becomes a tool and an integrative part of every game. Use it as a poker chip, or even build your Dungeons & Dragons map with a twist.
The elegant contemporary design makes GEMJI a standing out home decoration. Use it as a book divider, a stylish fridge magnet, or as a coaster to surprise your friends and start playing without getting out a box.
Instantaneously prototype your design concepts with GEMJI, test various compositions, and share them with friends.



The full sets (Original & Light) come with a Rulebook with 21 games and a Build book with 7 model instructions. We've been balancing between good variety and keeping it lightweight shipping-wise. The GEMJI Mini Set comes with 6 games printed on the packaging. They are compatible with any GEMJI set. We have many more ideas in the pipeline - check them out in the Coming Soon table below. Visit GEMJI.com for all new games and their rules, and updates. Enjoy a 1 Year access with your Light pack or be unbeatable with a Lifetime Access with your Original Pack.



GEMJI Gate 
Use dexterity and swiftness to score points in the opponent’s field, while preventing them from scoring in your own field.
GEMJI Maze
Challenge your friend to a strategy game, calculate your moves better, outsmart and block your opponent in creative ways, and be the first to escape the maze!
GEMJI Jungle
Find your way through the jungle to the end of the board, but be careful - your opponent takes the same path. Figure out how to outwit them!

GEMJI is inclusive, family-friendly, accessible to visually impaired people by design, and fun for all ages.


Wherever, whenever or with whoever you are, there is a new game waiting for you on the platform. Create a new habit and visit our website regularly to check the updated list of games.

Video walk-through of the platform - now in Beta Version on GEMJI.com :
PLAY



For people who love characters, role-playing, imaginary worlds, and fantasy concepts, we plan to produce metal skins. They easily snap and attach to the magnetic tiles. The future of GEMJI includes skin sets for different themes, terrains, as well as custom designs for your GEMJI game concepts. These will be introduced in 2021, boosting the existing games, as well as the new ones, created by the community. Hope you like it!




Hi! We are the game lovers that created the heart and brains of GEMJI. It was an exciting adventure to bring GEMJI to Life. Now it’s up to you to unlock the universe of possibilities.


Bonus Videos

FAQ with Mark, the inventor of GEMJI 
PLAY

GEMJI as RPG / D&D modular map explained
Meet German - he is 33 months old and loves to play with GEMJI
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Before we even started building this campaign, we spend thousands of collective hours on research, engineering, design, prototyping, product testing, playtesting, and most importantly - we have paid already for the molding instruments and have created a REAL PRODUCT. A short production batch of GEMJI is circulating the world for validation purposes as we speak. 
That being said, and this being our first Kickstarter project, things can come up with both production and shipping no matter how much we plan. Especially with a new pandemic regime. In terms of shipping - we plan to use both economic & express delivery partners. For example, we have signed already a contract with DHL, so we've minimized the risk significantly. But things can happen that are out of our hands. No matter the circumstances though, we will give our best with the final stage of the delivery, like we've done with the rest of the project for the past 4 years.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
GEMJI is engineered to last for a long time if taken proper care. The ABS material is high-grade, like the one used for the popular building blocks. On the other hand, the variety of games in the system ensures that GEMJI is NOT just another object that will be produced and will sit locked in the cupboard. 
The creators expect that GEMJI will encourage players towards a culture where less is more, a more optimized consumer life - hence a better impact on the environment.

campaign.story:
That’s exactly what this is!
Shut Up & Sit Down, the best board game site on the entire internet, has teamed up with the party game professionals at Big Potato Games. Together, we’ve created a brand-new edition of Don’t Get Got with 120 new missions and an aggressively orange colour scheme.
If you don’t own Don’t Get Got, that’s perfect. Included in this £20 box is everything you need to play.
If you DO own Don’t Get Got, that’s perfect too! Think of this box as a very generous expansion, doubling the amount of missions in the base game and letting you play with up to 20 players. Imagine that! It would be carnage.
Check out SU&SD’s glowing review!
Are you the kind of hotshot who doesn’t have 10 minutes to watch a video? Not a problem, here’s a quick gif-stuffed overview:
Don’t Get Got is a game of secret missions for 2-10 players, and it takes place while you go about your day. Perfect places to break out Don’t Get Got would be living with housemates, at work, on holiday, at parties, even at gaming conventions.
Each player receives a cute little wallet full of unique missions, and then you just get back to living your life, except you’re immediately going to start scheming like a mean scheme machine:
Hand out some random missions to each player
Each mission will tell you what you’ve got to try and trick the other players into doing...
Read and insert the missions into your wallet
Each time you succeed at this you get to (a) flip over the little mission in your wallet, which is super satisfying:
Nailed it!
and (b) reveal your mission to the player who just got got, which is even more satisfying:
Point and rejoice
But there’s a catch! If you ever get caught (which is as easy as another player asking if you’re trying to trick them), that mission is flipped over to the “FAILED IT” side for the rest of the game.
Failed it :'(
The first player to complete 3 missions wins!
Victory
The writers at Shut Up & Sit Down have had a great time creating new expansions for some of their favourite party games, like Monikers and The Metagame. When Big Potato asked if we wanted to design a brand-new box for Don’t Get Got, we leapt at the chance.
Included in this Shut Up & Sit Down Special Edition are 10 plastic wallets, 1 collectible sticker and 120 missions, all of which were painstakingly entered into a spreadsheet by team SU&SD.
In all seriousness, we worked super hard on this, and went through several rounds of refinement and feedback with the original game’s designers. The perfect Don’t Get Got mission makes you smile when you receive it, and represents an interesting, open-ended puzzle as to how exactly you’re going to pull it off. We aimed to deliver that with each and every mission.


But of course not! With enough pledges we will reveal not one, not five, but three stretchy goals that we’d like to offer all of our backers for absolutely free.
You took that poor target and smashed it into pieces!
As a reward, you’ve unlocked the ‘EPIC MISSIONS’ pack — 20 Kickstarter-exclusive missions that require so much forethought, even a criminal mastermind would wince at them.
Surprise extra stretchy goal unlocked! 
We messed up with the shipping, so here’s something to say sorry — all the cards from the original Don’t Get Got game. That’s 186 extra missions, carefully placed inside each and every copy of the Kickstarter special edition.
You want the rest? Well guess what, you can’t handle the rest!
Only joking, of course you can. Introducing the ‘GAME NIGHT’ pack — 20 Kickstarter-exclusive missions, all designed to be played while you’re playing another board game. How meta are we?
You’ve unlocked this year’s hottest fashion accessory!
Fresh from the catwalks of Milan, it’s the SU&SD x Big Potato pin badge. Whether you pin it to your bag, your ear or your fancy lapels, everyone will know you backed the hottest game around (and that you might be up to something sneaky).
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
It should be a relief to anyone who’s watched team SU&SD finger board game components into their mouths that they won’t be involved in manufacturing or fulfilment at all.

Instead, publishing and manufacturing will be handled by Big Potato Games, who have published over 50 games and distributed to countries all over the world. They have literally shipped out more games than you’ve had hot dinners. We're using Blackbox as our fulfilment service who are the complete bomb and we trust with all of our possessions.

Additionally, the copy of this Special Edition that you can see in the Kickstarter video is a near-final copy sent to us directly from the manufacturers, so all we need to do is tell them how many more copies to make. That’s why you can expect your copy of this edition as early as April 2021.


Thank you so much, everybody. 

Sincerely,

SU&SD and Big Potato

It’s been a couple of weeks since our last update and you’ve probably got a few questions on your mind. Things like:

“Where’s my game?”

“What’s the deal with these stickers?”

Around two weeks ago, we promised we’d be in touch with an update on shipping, to keep everyone’s minds at ease. Well, here it is: 

Everything is going exactly as planned… more or less!

Originally, we told everyone that the games would be arriving at the very end of May, but of course, they were never all going to arrive at the exact same time. A lot of you have already received your games (and we hope that your sneak skills are already maxed out), but there’s still some of you waiting. So, please refer to this handy guide from the factory:

updates.update_userinfo: AN UPDATE ON SHIPPING (AND EVERYTHING ELSE)
updates.update_content:
Hello

We’ll start with the “Everything Else”.

A few weeks ago, we asked you for your phone number. What we should’ve done is explain WHY we need it and WHAT we’ll be doing with it.

updates.update_userinfo: UPDATE: GETTING THE GAMES OUT OF CHINA
updates.update_content:
It’s been around a month-ish since our last update and you’ve probably got two big questions:
WHERE are the games?
WHEN am I getting them?
Well luckily, we’ve got answers for both. All the games are more or less finished — they’re just stuck in China, queuing to leave the factory. According to the latest news from our manufacturing partners, the games are scheduled to ship out of the factory on .

Hello,

It’s been a while since we’ve spoken, but rest assured, we haven’t been ignoring you.

Basically, there’s been a few production issues with the game that we’ve been trying to juggle. Before we announced the bad news to you, we wanted to see if there was anyway we could fix it — but sadly it looks like that’s not possible.

updates.update_userinfo: SOON TO BE SNEAKING INTO YOUR HOMES
updates.update_content:
Well — it sounded a lot better in our heads.
What we meant to say was: good news everyone! We managed to raise over $330,000, officially bringing our new creation to life!

Well would you look at that. You’ve gone and broken another one of our lovely, lovely targets. Looks like you’ve left us no choice. It’s time to reveal…
THE FINAL STRETCH-Y GOAL
Like a stoney-faced villain in Scooby-Doo, it’s time to pull the mask off our final stretch goal and end this madness once and for all. So, without further ado, here it is:
We keep setting up targets, you keep knocking them down. It’s a very nice feeling, so here’s a brand new Stretchy Goal to say thank you. It’s called the ‘GAME NIGHT’ pack!

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Quin is bringing thoughtful strategy to ages 8-80, to families, board rooms and park tables alike. As an indie sci-fi publisher, this is Arch & Gravity's first entry into the retail board games market, so we're expanding our manufacturing and distributions partnerships. Bringing our experience at international book and art marketing, this is an exciting new venture for us. We're building a brand here, focused on hard sci-fi and quality productions, with the resources of our wholly devoted creatives on tap, but there's no denying that the climb to get this game into every living room is steep. Thankfully, coming from Colorado, we understand that hard climbs bring the best views.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
Quin is an execution of timeless, artistic design, and will look as good on a shelf or table today, as it will on an intergalactic shuttle centuries from now. At every step of the process, we choose materials and methods that last, prioritizing quality and originality. These materials, boards and boxes are superior to others on the market, emphasizing quality for long-term use.
Reusability and recyclability
The Quin Deluxe package is entirely honed, using a minimum of materials from the start. With just the 2 Quin Key Instruction Cards, pieces, board and Strategy Guide, Quin uses far less paper and plastic than many new games, without sacrificing variety or replayability. Nearly every part of Quin is recyclable, and everywhere possible we have integrated recycled materials into the production. If we can reach our Earth Edition Stretch Goal, we plan to produce a fully biodegradable version of the game, which if not a first ever, is definitely quite the rarity.
Sustainable materials
All of our manufacturer's products meet the standards of CE, ASTM F963/CPSC, Rosh Reach.
Environmentally friendly factories
Partnering with Gameland, the papers used do not contain chlorine, and the inks do not contain cadmium. All of the materials used are environmentally friendly, non-toxic.
Sustainable Distribution
Partnering with Quartermaster Logistics, our shipping will be localized, by professionals who know that cost effectiveness and environmental efficiency are often synonymous. In everything we do, we strive to be sustainable. Our commitment to the planet and future generations is unwavering, a core principle of Arch & Gravity Publishing.
Something else
Quin is a game of science fiction, and aims to teach abstract, creative, strategic thought and honorable gamesmanship. In its theming and design, a general respect of real, modern, living science permeates the whole project. This mindset is essential in raising a generation of gamers who understand and respect science, and the world they live in.

campaign.story:
QWARKS WANTED is easy to understand and fast to play fun party game for the whole family. You play as a Qwark Hunter whose goal is to catch Qwarks matching several criteria that change each turn. The more your captured Qwarks meet the criteria, the more points you earn. The hunt is on!

QWARKS WANTED will not be available in retail. The remaining boxes will only be available for purchase on the Smile Editions website at a higher price or during conventions. Don’t miss the opportunity to have a very limited edition of the game by supporting us. 😉 
High-quality components (without needing to unlock Stretch Goals 😃).
Every component of the game is of very high quality: a rigid game box, linen finish cards, 3mm thickness tokens, and a rules booklet made of 128gsm glossy paper.
Display 4 Criterion cards vertically and 1 Criterion card horizontally.
The first 4 cards identify the types of Qwarks you will have to catch. The last card indicates a type of Qwark not to catch.
All players simultaneously reveal 2 Qwark cards and each will try to catch a card with the most wanted criteria on it (but not the forbidden criterion) before their opponents.
The more criteria there are on a Qwark card caught by a player, the more points he will score.
Oh and don't forget to look at cards with rare Qwarks on it because you will be able to earn extra points.
Criteria change at each round and at the end of the game, the player with the biggest score is declared Best Qwark Hunter!
QWARKS WANTED JUNIOR is a different version of the game that is using the same components for children from 6 years old and their parents.
Display 4 Qwark cards face down that will be the Wanted Qwarks. Then all players simultaneously reveal 1 card of their deck and each will try to catch a card with the most wanted Qwarks on it before their opponents.
A player scores 2 points per identical Qwark and of the same color on his card and 1 point per identical Qwark but of a different color. And of course, the rare Qwarks always earn extra points.

Do you prefer video explanations? All right! Just have a look above and make your choice.
 Boardgame Heaven - How To Play & Review (English)
Mister Zombie - Comment jouer et avis (Français)

Want to read the rules? Just clic on the booklet below.

Group and save!
Group up with your friends to buy multiple boxes and enjoy even lower shipping costs.
Customs-friendly worldwide

You won't be charged extra customs fees. If you are mistakenly charged customs fees when the games arrive, just let us know and we'll pay you back.

I am sorry, but I will not be shipping to the following countries:
Afghanistan, Irak, Iran, North-Korea, Russia and Syria.
I didn't plan Stretch goals for this game because I developed it as well as I wanted it to be. No more, no less. I chose the best components and the game has been playtested hundreds of times with hundreds of different adults and children. If thanks to your tremendous support, this Kickstarter campaign surpasses my expectations, it will allow me to offer you other totally different (but equally fun) games in the future. 😃

All images, components, game mechanics, etc. shown of the game are subject to change per manufacturer's requirements and/or the publisher's preference for what is in the best interest of the game and the backers.

campaign.story:
We have partnered with the wonderful team at The Broken Token to design a wooden insert for Dinosaur World! This insert will be available to pre-order and purchase directly through their site after this campaign ends, with their insert orders shipping around the same time as we are fulfilling backers’ games.
Since then, we knew there was thirst for an even greater expansion into the Dinoverse, but we didn’t know exactly what or when. Enter OG DI designer, Brian Lewis holding prototypes for NOT ONE, but TWO new games set in the world. Brian sold us right then and there on both new standalone designs by himself and Dino Island newbies, David McGregor and Marissa Misura. We knew if we were going to go back to this space, it needed to be something special. It had to wow us and take the IP to places we had not previously dreamt of going. The two games you have before you are just that. All we can say is… Hold onto your butts!
We are all pee-in-our-pants excited over here about finally getting to share something this flipping cool with our most dedicated, creative, and inspiring fanbase. (Dino Island fans are our favorites, y’all. Shhhhh!) And we know you are going to flip over the campaign we have in store… LET’S DO THIS!
After the campaign ends, there will be a pledge manager. Anyone at the 5 dollar level or higher will have access to upgrade their pledge at this time. This window will be short as the game will enter production as soon as the campaign ends, and final numbers will need to be locked in quickly. Pricing after the campaign ends will be 5 dollars higher for each copy of the game than during the campaign, so your best value is to pledge for a copy of the game while the campaign is live.
  Timed Exclusives are stretch goals that will be included for no extra charge in all pledges that include the associated game or add-on (i.e. all Dinosaur World timed exclusives will be included in all pledges that include Dinosaur World at no extra cost).

The Kickstarter Timed Exclusives may be available directly from Pandasaurus Games (Conventions, website, etc) at a later date at limited quantities.  These will not be widely available, but will be available for purchase at key conventions (such at Gen Con and Essen) and potentially our website later but never enter distribution. 
Kickstarter Exclusives are stretch goals that will be included for no extra charge in all pledges that include the associated game or add-on (i.e. all Dinosaur World Kickstarter exclusives will be included in all pledges that include Dinosaur World at no extra cost). 

Kickstarter Exclusives are only available during this campaign and will never be sold at conventions, on our website or directly in the future.  These are true exclusives for Kickstarter backers during this campaign.   We may make them available again in a future Kickstarter campaign, but no plans currently exist for future Dinosaur Island Kickstarter campaigns.
After the campaign ends, we will be charging actual shipping costs. We want to strike a fair balance of value for our backers while ensuring high-quality and fair shipping prices for each backer. By shipping within the EU, UK, Australia, China, Canada, and the United States we are hoping to get as favorable of shipping rates as possible. We will be working with well-vetted partners in each region who have experience with Kickstarter reward fulfillment and come highly recommended by other publishers within the industry and will take into account good (and bad) experiences that other publishers have experienced.
Our goal is for the average shipping costs for backers in the EU, UK, US, Canada, Australia and China to be under 20 USD, with shipping for backers outside of these regions to come from the most cost-effective area for the lowest possible shipping price.
Backers in some regions, especially the Middle East, Africa, South and Central America, Russia, and Brazil may experience high shipping fees which reflect the actual cost of shipping to these areas in excess of 50 USD; also be aware that you may be responsible for import duties, taxes, and/or brokerage fees, and that we must comply with international law and cannot mark your reward as a gift or declare that it has a value of zero.  Shipping is also notoriously unreliable in Russia and Brazil especially, while we welcome our fans from these regions, because of high loss and damage rates, Pandasaurus will not reship lost packages to these countries.  Please be aware of this before backing the project.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Pandasaurus Games is a nearly 8-year-old board game publisher who has delivered hundreds of thousands of board games worldwide including 9 Kickstarter projects. We are confident in our ability to deliver the rewards listed and on time.

The artwork for the game is 100% complete and has finished pre-production at the factory. Short of a production issue with some of the bespoke components, delays in shipping or issues with proofing that require reworks, we intend to release the game on time. We will always choose quality production over timeliness, so delay of the game is possible, but we will be ready to hit the printer with final components right at the end of the campaign.

There is the chance of delay in shipping or customs that is largely out of the control of our company, but we are experienced in moving products through customs. Of course, with multiple freight solutions going to various parts of the world it's possible some regions will get the game more quickly than others. Our goal is to ship the game as soon as it lands on any continent, so we'll have to ask for your patience if some regions get the game before others.

updates.update_content:
Hi everyone! Hope you've been enjoying a sunny start to summer!

Since the last update, we've still been fighting tooth and nail to get all the games onto containers. It's hard to get multiple containers at the same time, since they're in such high demand right now. This makes it harder to ship print runs that are larger than normal, which is why several Kickstarter campaigns have been affected in similar ways. We've managed to get one container out of the warehouse, but we need around three more to fit everything that is currently printed, packed, and just sitting in China.  We are scheduled for those to be picked up next week, but there is a fun game going on right now where containers (and space on boats) can get stolen out from under you at the 11th hour - we're doing everything we can (ie. sending increasingly sternly worded emails) to make sure we keep these containers.
