campaign.story:
"My husband and I would like to open a mini-golf business and we  would like to hire someone to design us a course. We have asked several  designers like you to propose us something, so whomever designs the best  one is hired!"
Minigolf Designer is a competitive free form puzzle board game for 1 to 5 players that plays in 60 to 90 minutes (around 20 minutes per players).
An example of Hole made out of tiles
In Minigolf Designer, players will compete to collect tiles representing sections of minigolf holes, and arrange them the way they want to form a 9 holes miniature golf course. However, in the end the players will gain more or less victory points depending on certain aspects of their minigolf, and also depending on the number of people drawn on their minigolf.
One of the three Rulers used to present the tiles and hold the turn order
Tiles are proposed to the players ordered from the least to the most valuable tile (depending on the number of victory points that the tile provides), but this order becomes also the player's next turn order.
The game is simple and plays fast, as players do only one thing during their turn: pick a tile and place it on their minigolf design. After placing around 40 tiles, their minigolf is complete and players can score them to declare the winner.  
Example of a complete minigolf course that a player can create during the game
Minigolf Designer delivers a quite new player experience to board game lovers, mostly due to its free form aspect. The fact that you can create any design gives this feeling of freedom. You can actually play just by following your artistic creativity!
But it's not a purely artistic random placement of pieces either. The puzzle aspect comes from the challenge to assemble the tiles in a way that satisfies a bunch of preferences. However, there is no unique solution; with the 256 tiles present in the box, you can build millions of miniature golf courses!
Competitive players will also enjoy the game by trying to satisfy as much design constraints as they can, if not all (which is possible). There are 7 design aspects that could give you victory points, but none of them are mandatory. Therefore, both kids, casual players and competitive players can enjoy the game but in different ways.
"I personally like to play minigolf, and I always enjoy to discover the various obstacles every time I try a new minigolf. This was the triggering idea for this game. I thought the guys who design real miniature golf courses may have a lot of fun just to invent new obstacles and try to fit all the holes on the available space, in a logical manner. So I designed my game around this idea, and now we can experience the same fun." - Alban Nanty (designer of this game)
Since this is our first publication, we do not have a network of retailers to get Minigolf Designer to a wider audience, which means this may be your best chance to get the game!
Please note that the final appearance of the game components may differ from the images above. 
The minigolf tiles are 4 cm (1.6 inches) wide. The cards are in poker format (around 6 x 9 cm). The game box will be 30 x 30 x 7 cm (11.8 x 11.8 x 2.75 inches). The estimated weight of the box is 2.150 Kg (4.7 pounds) (with complete punch boards). 
Overview of all the different cards
As you can see the turn is very fast. Players will need between 36 to 40 tiles to complete their design, which means the players will play around 40 turns before the end of the game.
The tiles are presented to the players on a ruler (with one more tile than the number of players), but they are sorted according to their number printed on the back. When a player pick a tile, she leaves her pawn at the same place. The order of the pawns on the ruler becomes the next turn order.
Therefore, the more victory points the tile you pick has, the more likely you will play last in the next turn, leaving you with less choice in the next turn. On the contrary, if you pick a boring tile, or even if you pass in front of everyone, you will be the first player to choose a tile in the next turn.
Simple Version
The above explanation is the basic mode, suitable for kids, family and casual players. This is probably the version you will play for the first time, to get familiarized with the game.
Advanced Version
The game also comes with extra wooden disks and cards, to play a more competitive version of the game. In this version, the players follow the exact same rules as the simple version, but at the beginning of the game (and later during the game), players will have a chance to bet secretly on which aspect of their minigolf they will more focus on. At the end of the game, the players can gain extra victory points, if they are actually better than the other players for the aspect(s) that they chose. However, this is risky, because if they are not the best, they will loose points.
Solo mode
The rule book contains also some rule adaptations to play solo. In solo mode, the player don't need the Rulers, but still draw 2 tiles during each turn, for choosing one. They can pass, meaning not choosing one of the two tiles, but that makes them loose victory points.
 Watch a full game with two players:
For non English speaking videos, you can always click on the CC button to activate the subtitles, then click on the Gear icon and choose Subtitles/CC > Auto-translate > English, in order to get the subtitle in English (or any other language you like).
Here is a review of the game prototype that we sent to the Youtuber Maurice Lapierre. In this video Maurice presents you all the game components and gives his first impression on the game mechanics. 
 Here is a complete rule explanation, and game component presentation from the youtuber Dámaso de Damasco y sus distracciones:
 And a solo game from the same youtuber:
Unlike many other board games whose illustration is made on computer, Minigolf Designer is really a game of art. Its original artwork was all paint by hand by our artist Gul. She painted 170 different tiles in 10 x 10 cm (3.9 x 3.9 inches) format, even if we knew that tiles will be smaller in the game (4 x 4 cm or 1.6 x 1.6 inches). 
Example of the tiles painted by the artist
We decided to give away those pieces of art, already framed in a modern and sober frame. If you pledge at the "The Game + One Original Art Work" level, you will receive a unique painting already framed and ready to be displayed on your desk. The pieces of art will be randomly distributed to the backers of that pledge level, therefore it will be a surprise to see which tile you received. You can then try to find the tile in the game and maybe even notice some difference if the tile has been edited after scanning. 
 As we only have 170 painted tiles, we had to limit the quantity for this pledge level, so hurry up if you want your original art work!
An example of an original painted art work in its frame
The above picture is one of the possible tile that you may receive, but each available painting that we give away is different, so the image above is just here to give you an overview of the overall look, but the tile will certainly be different. The frame itself should be the one displayed on the image.
The painting size is around 10 x 10 cm (3.9 x 3.9 inches), and the outside frame is a bit less than 15 x 15 cm (5.9 x 5.9 inches).
We run this Kickstarter campaign through our company named Thematic Games. Alban has started up this company in 2015 for the purpose of creating immersive games and entertaining experiences. We believe immersion and story telling is what makes people dream, therefore we always pay attention to the theme of each game we create.
For this project we are also helped by Jerome Levy, an Executive Producer in one of the major Video Game companies, who helps us as an adviser for the Kickstarter campaign and the overall aspect of the project.
For more info on Gul's creative work, you can visit the Wenlin Studio website.
All shipping cost are paid up-front on Kickstarter.
The cost displayed in local currency in between brackets are just estimates, depending on the currency exchange rates at the time this page was created. Kickstarter will display the exact shipping cost added to your pledge when you click on a pledge level.
You may expect custom fees depending on your country (however in many countries, a low value item like this game is custom free).
Each order will have a tracking number that we can communicate in case of excessive delivery time.
For certain countries specially expensive, we have set a specific cost not listed above (which may differ from the "Rest of Europe" or "Rest of the World" cost). In any case, you will see the shipping cost when you click on a pledge package, depending on your location.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This project is our first Kickstarter campaign, therefore we are learning and discovering all the Kickstarter process. Even if we read extensive testimonies and advice online on how to run a smooth campaign, we may encounter unforeseen situations specific to our project.

Design
The Design is completed, we have play tested the game many times, and not only with our families and friends, but also with strangers. We found those stranger testers in a bar where board game fans meet each week to play. The testimonies that you can watch at the end of the video are real testimonies from people we never met before, giving true feedback... they are not paid actors.
We are confident that the rules are solids, works well and don't need any more tuning.

Artwork
All artwork has been 100% completed.

Editing
100% of the game components has been edited and prepared for production. The rule book is completed (you can download it above), and all the punch boards have been designed to optimize their quantity (there will be 11 punch boards in the box). All the cards have been designed.

Manufacturing
We have contacted two different game manufacturers, and asked for a quotation for the production of our game. Both gave a similar production price. We got some printing sample and pawn sample and are satisfied with the quality. Jun Ding, our production manager is a Chinese native speaker, therefore we don't have any communication issues with the game manufacturer and we can control the quality.

Shipping
We have asked shipping cost to two different transporters and we have chose one of them to end up with the shipping cost described above. Those cost are similar to what the other Kickstarter board games of the same size estimated.

campaign.story:
Clogging is nasty, but ignoring the problem is only going to make the matter worse.
That’s why we came up with HUROYAMA, a simple straightforward solution to your never-ending problem.
It practically requires no installation, it’s aesthetic, and it just works. 
An unobstructed drain should be a basic human right. Through its mountain peak design, water can still flow through freely while hair and debris can be caught from the bottom. 
Whether your drain is surrounded by soap bubbles or hair debris, with HUROYAMA, water can seamlessly flow through the cavities on the summit.  
▼ As hair and bubble start building up from the bottom, water can still travel freely down the drain.
▼ Traditional drainer's one-dimensional design makes it easy for debris to build upon the surface level, blocking the entrance and causing water to flood. 
The unique protrusion points on the rim direct the water flow in a spiral fashion, allowing water to efficiently pass through. 
 - Grippy Exterior
Textured exterior makes it easy to pick up in slippery conditions. It also helps prevent hair from flowing through easily.
- Skidproof Base
Glossy finish increases the adhesive characteristics of the silicone material, ensuring that they stay firmly on the drainer. 
▼ Hair and debris can be easily removed. Rinse with water and it’s as good as new.  
▼ Anchoring points help stabilize the rim. 
HR-BIODCIDE silver ion particle can effectively eliminate 99.99% of bacteria, ensuring a bacteria and mold-free bathroom even under humid conditions.
5mm anchoring legs stick firmly on the drainer holes, preventing the catcher from drifting when a large flow of water is encountered. They can be easily nipped off if necessary.  
▼ Place it n’ forget it. Tool-free installation, easy to clean.
▼ Compatible with bathtub drain.
Flexible silicone material bounces back to its original shape. You’ll never have to endure another lego-stepping pain.
Designed and made in Taiwan
Dimensions: 86 x 86 x 18 mm (3.38 x 3.38 x 0.7 inch)
Weight: 15 g (0.52 oz)
Material: Food Safe Silicone

※ Please confirm your drainer dimension before making a pledge ※

▼ Material Testing Report  
Silicone Material Report ｜  Antibacterial Agent Testing Report
Like a lot of people, our simple life was once plagued with clogged drains. We decided to put matters into our own hands and started making 3D printed prototypes. After much refinement and revisions, we’ve finally got to a point where our models were able to effectively stop the clogging issues. That’s when we decided to share our creation with folks on Kickstarter.
 
HUROYAMA took its inspiration from Mt. Jade, the tallest mountain in entire northeast Asia. The mountain peak design of HUROYAMA wasn’t just for aesthetic purposes only. We inhabit the Bauhaus design philosophy and set out to create a product that includes a harmony of form and function. We think from the end user’s perspective. We solve the inconvenience in everyday life with design. We focus not just on improving the functionality, but the entire user experience.

That been said, if any unforeseen circumstances were to happen, we will be taking full responsibility and inform you with timely updates and answer any of your concerns. We thank you from the bottom of our hearts for joining us on this journey!

campaign.story:
The average toothbrush contains more than 10 million bacteria, including E. coli and Staph, according to a recent study at the University of Manchester in England. And researchers from the University of Alabama at Birmingham recently found that brushes stored in the bathroom—a.k.a. all of them—are contaminated with fecal germs, among other bacteria.


Using a cover on your toothbrush after brushing your teeth seems like a good idea but, actually, it's poor health practice. Moisture gets trapped within the cap keeping your toothbrush bristles from drying. This promotes bacterial growth.
The bathroom countertop is home to 452 bacteria per square inch, so if you leave your toothbrush on it, you’re putting those bacteria in your mouth.  
Bacteria can spread from one head of a toothbrush to another when the bristles touch. If your family member is sick or has an infection, touching toothbrushes could spread their illness and germs to you. 


 There are countless toothbrush holders and sanitizers on the market today but almost none follow the natural, easy and fast method of decontaminating your toothbrush. 
SensiFresh uses a brush-like pattern of silicone heads, housed in a protective holder to capture toothbrush handles of just about any size or shape.
These long, flexible (but durable) silicone finger-like structures easily grab toothbrushes and create an environment that isolates toothbrushes, preventing cross-contamination from other toothbrushes in the holder.                  



Other holders are easily exposed to gargled water and toothpaste residue. Leading to the same contamination issues that you were seeking to solve in the first place. 
The reverse toothbrush holder by Working K using an internal structure of silicon bristles that prevents contamination. 


Contacts between toothbrushes can cause unwanted infection.
The cup also gets dirty from collected toothbrush water. Our device allows for the separate but concurrent holding of whatever you need: Toothbrushes, razors, toothpaste, tongue cleaner, even a comb without cross-contamination. 


Capping a toothbrush or putting it in a container ensures the toothbrush will never dry and worse, can serve as a breeding ground for germs.
Inserting toothbrushes upside down (inverted) in the SensiFresh ensures you are getting the fastest, most natural drying and decontamination of toothbrushes after use. The free flow of air, absence of cross-contamination bacteria make the SensiFresh the easiest, most natural way to store and dry your toothbrushes. 


SensiFresh is made of easy to sterilize dishwasher safe materials so you can keep it clean. Or use microwave or boiling water to thoroughly sterilize it. 


SensiFresh is space-saving and easy to install. Simply remove the strip at the back of the holder and place SensiFresh anywhere you want. 


SensiFresh is not only for toothbrush. Take it to your shower, kitchen, office and more. SensiFresh can do it all. 


Founded in 2016, Working-K has been working to improve the quality of human life by developing products that are essential, not just good to have. Through research and development, the company continues to march towards becoming a leading product supplier.
The new 2019 product, "Reversed Toothbrush Holder" will enable safe and hygienic use of toothbrushes that have been neglected. With crowdfunding, we will create practical usage reviews of supporters. They will be utilized for new product development as well as for the coverage of initial production costs.

campaign.story:
3 years ago we attempted to launch Juice Card V1, Removable power bank that was not crowdfunded successfully. We proceeded despite not getting the funding and then after having some beta testers issues with Juice Card 1, At this point we pulled the plug on this project and decided to go back to the drawing board.
Although the current project Juice Card 2 is the same concept, Its actually very different and much improved. We eliminated the attached output charging cable and went completely Wireless charging. We partnered up with a well known battery manufacture and created our own custom A type 5000 mAh battery. We also designed our own magnetic universal eco-system that is compatible with any wireless charging phone. Below are the specs so you may compare the differences between the two projects.
Introducing, Juice Card, Magnetic Wireless Power Bank by exō. Don't be fooled by deceiving bulky power banks claiming to be slim, exō Juice Card is currently the worlds thinnest magnetic power bank at 10.5mm at 5000mAh. Designed to be so compact that its comfortable holding both your phone and Juice Card without compromise, So you can keep your devices charged wherever you go.   
PLAY

Smartphone, bulky power bank, and charging cable. Having to carrying all of them at the same time can sometimes be a headache. How often have you left your cable behind by accident? Or too tired after work you forgot to charge up your mobile devices? exō has the simple everyday solution for all of these problems, so you can finally be free from all the tangled cables that bind you.
Magnetic Wireless Charging
exō Juice Card is a certified wireless charging battery pack. That means, it's compatible with all Qi enabled devices, including your Air Pod Pros. With a battery capacity of 5000mAh, and pass through charging, Charge your device + Juice Card simultaneously over night and wake up to a full battery the entire next day.
Minimal & Light
exō weighs only 134g. It's so minimal and light, you won't feel it there. Also, since it can charge your mobile devices cable-free, you'll  never have a tangled mess in your pockets ever again.
Super Fast Recharge
exō features Dual Qualcomm 3.0A Micro USB + Type-C port for super fast recharge. Equipped with Qualcomm 3.0 quick charge, works seamlessly with iPhone and Android devices at 7.5W power, respectively.
Charge Two Devices
exō can charge up to two devices at the same time. One device wirelessly and the other device by the included cable through its output 3.0A Qualcomm USB-A port.
Car Vent Clip
exō Juice Card has integrated the use of a car vent clip for hands free charging and driving. By strategically placing a magnetic contact point on the backside of the Juice Card, simply place the back of Juice Card + Device on the magnetic vent clip. Allowing you to wirelessly charge the phone and still able to view maps or other apps while driving.   
Specs
 Magnetic Wireless Power bank: Model JC2
 Capacity: 5000mAh (18.5WH) Li-Polymer                    
 Wireless Output:5.0V=1.0A                                              
 Output: 5.0V=3.0A (total 3.0A).                                                                                               
 Input: 5.0V=2.0A                                                                                                      
 Dimensions: 115mm x 74mm x 10.5mm | Weight: 134g                                                  
 Safety Certifications: CE, FCC, RoHS, UN38.3            
 Safety Systems: Overheat Protection | Overcharge Protection   
US PATENT: D825,456S   
Warranty
While many other Kickstarter campaigns end their job after shipments, we go a step further and offer a 1 year warranty that covers defects in materials, faulty batteries and any malfunctions after you receive your Juice Card. We have a very close working relationship with our supplier network in China and are very confident in our quality control procedures.
Designing & Prototyping
From the beginning, we knew we wanted to make a battery pack that is minimal, light and compact, but powerful enough to be useful on a daily basis. Most importantly we wanted to share the portable power bank with multiple devices, We needed an innovative idea that can truly make people's lives easier.
Once we got the idea for a Universal true wireless battery pack, we jumped on this chance to design something that is perfectly balanced for beauty, utility, and most important of all, convenience.  
 Universal Compatibility 
Team
The exō team is a small, self funded start up company out of Dallas, TX. Led by Atticus, who comes from an Architecture and design background. Creating unique useful products that make life easier has always been his passion. Our exclusive manufacture in Shenzhen China currently employ 10 super engineers that assist in all of our product creations, They have well over 20+ years in small electronics such as, power banks, headphones, blue tooth accessories. We are very familiar with the whole manufacturing process and we are in contact with them 6 days a week via Skype.
 Time Line 
We've spent the past 2.5 years on developing the Juice Card and have completed many of the steps including tooling, and almost ready to start the manufacturing stage. Now, we are on Kickstarter to get a large enough Minimum Order Quantity to help drive down the cost of production, This will give us the best opportunity to bring you a the first magnetic wireless battery pack at the most reasonable price possible. You can also help us  by giving us feedback on the Juice Card so we can perfect it even more before we enter the final manufacturing stage. Thank for taking the time to read through our campaign! Please don't forget to follow and share our project on social media!

updates.update_content:
At this time I have unfortunate news.
Originally the manufacture agreed to re make the Juice Card free of charge since the original shipment couldn’t be located by the transit company which is also now out of business. Our manufacture is now under new management and changed their mind on this offer. Many of the original sales agents and engineers I worked with on this project have been laid off.

Just wanted to jump on and give the latest update I've received. Long story short, we got burned by the shipping forwarder and we are starting the manufacturing process from scratch. Unfortunately, the total time will be approx. 45-60 days. This unfortunate event is a huge loss for me because now I'm basically making the 1500 Juice cards free and out of my pocket. So for anyone asking for a refund, at the moment that is not an option.
Plain and simple, we got burned. The process: After the product was complete, the manufacturer contacts a 3rd party shipping freight forwarder. There are several 100 independent forwards to choose from, the freight forwarder finds the cheapest quickest rate and handles all shipping process.

I apologize for the lack of update but at this time I still have no real update. Customs has some how lost our shipment and currently trying to locate it. They asked me to reach back out to them in 10 days if I haven’t heard back from them. I feel like I am also getting the run around.
Some have inquired about refunds, but at this time that isn’t an option. All the money collected went into production and shipment of the JuiceCard which is currently somewhere in the US. Also all fees from crowdfunding platforms were taken out prior to us receiving your contribution.

I want to start off by apologizing for the lack of updates lately. Each week I've tried to give an accurate update but we are continually being let down. I've left several messages and emails for the US Customs department who are in possession of our product. 
Juice Cards have been sitting with US Customs for well over 3 weeks, I'm told that our product is considered non-essential and hasn't been given any priority. Majority of Customs attention has been focused on 3M, N95 masks and other protective gear coming from China.

Hope everyone is doing well and being safe through this crazy times. 
Our Juice Card shipment has been complete and ready to ship for over 14 days now. But due to the pandemic, A limited amount of cargo flights from China to USA have been scheduled. 
As of this morning, We finally got our shipment loaded on a cargo flight and is currently headed to Bedford, TX. We plan to get these shipped to our 1500+ pre order and backers as soon as we can.

First off, we know there is a lot going on with the Covid-19, We wish you all health and safety to you and your family.
As for Juice Card, The manufacture is located in Shenzhen, China. The factory took every precaution to help eliminate the threat by taking and 1 month off from work. Even when returning they only allowed a handful of workers to slowly return each day to ensure the safety of the other workers and factory.

The factory has allowed 70% of the workers back into the facility. Next week assembly /production is expected to resume back to normal. This process which includes all testing 10-14 days. The Ship date from the manufacture is on March 25. It will take 7-10 days to arrive to my warehouse in the Bedford, TX. USA. All orders will be sent within 2-3 days.
Again we do appreciate your patience, We sent the Juice Card to Lewis @unboxtherapy, you can see his review in the link below.

My manufacture has partially resumed working. They are allowing some workers who did not travel back to work. It’s a step in the right direction, Juice card production will ramp up as more and more ppl arrive back to work each week.
Thank you

Unfortunately at this time I have bad news. Our manufacture is located in China, although Shenzhen very far from the reported virus outbreak. The Chinese government has a mandatory shut down and delayed factories from re-opening. Workers who have traveled for the holiday within China must stay home for additional 15 days. The factory is scheduled to re open on Monday February 24.
This is going to delay the assembly process, but all juice card material has been prepared prior to the Chinese New Year.

Thank you to all of our backers for helping us reach our goal and making our project a reality!
There are a couple steps that need to take place:
Kickstarter will process credit card payments and transfer over the funds. This process can take roughly 2 weeks to complete.
We will be working with the CrowdOx team to send you an easy-to-use survey to collect your shipping address as well as allow you to configure your rewards and choose add-ons if need be.

campaign.story:
Livestream recording demo on Youtube @ 8 AM EST January 24th 2020. 
 Sound is all around us, all the time. Sometimes we ignore it, sometimes we cherish it. 
But why is sound so important?
We spend everyday hearing and listening, it is part of our lives.  Sound is influential, it can be informative, educational, conclusive, emotive, and many other things for us.
The problem is people remember only 30% of what they hear. Smartphones can do the ‘work’, they are certainly not built to be digital voice recorders. 
So why not try the better solution?
Born from a team of researchers and engineers who spend many hours in front of a computer, TileRec is our constant reminder to take a walk and "stop and smell the roses", so to speak.
We designed TileRec to exceed even our own extremely high personal standards.  

 Thin: Only 1/4 inch thin. Fits easily in the slimmest wallets.
 Small: As small as a piece of a chocolate bar ( 2.48 square inch).
 Light:  The same weight as a US penny (0.5 oz).
 Simple: Simple everything! Easy to use, easy to recharge and easy to playback.
 Long-lasting Battery: 24 hours on one charge. Designed to be used the entire day.
 Surround Recording: 360 degrees recording in a 15 feet range. Meeting, lecture or simple discussion - all sounds are easily captured with HQ clarity.
 Resistant: 100% recycled aluminum casing. Sleek design that blends discreetly in the everyday setup.
When we say "World's Smallest", we mean it. Measuring in at a staggering 1.6 inch in length, and 1/4 inch in height, weighing only 0.5 oz nothing else on the market comes close with the discreet portability offered by TileRec.  
TileRec is so slim and small than it can fit almost anywhere you can think of. It blends discreetly with everyday objects - in your pocket or wallet, between the pages of an agenda, on your desk or even on your child's backpack.
Traditional voice recorders were bulky and uncomfortable, limiting day-to-day activities.   
The idea of a voice recorder so slim and thin that it can be used as a  personal assistant is to improve the daily productivity of its user. And is practically indestructible.
You can drop it, step on it, even run the car over and then resume recording. 
The aluminum casing ensures complete protection for worry-free use.
When you combine these benefits with excellent audio quality, you get a voice recorder that is perfect for lectures, interviews, meetings, and dictations too! 
Most smartphones have a built-in voice recorder app that you can use anytime, so they can do the ‘work’, but certainly are not built to be digital voice recorders. 
Small, discreet and efficient, Tilerec is the latest voice recorder designed by ATTO DIGITAL, created to encompass the ideal balance between form and function. 
So, what makes TileRec so superior to smartphones when it comes to recording?  
TileRec is perfect for anyone that wants to work simpler, faster and better – without compromising quality. 
TileRec is recording Hi-Q MP3, using a 128 kbps bit rate. You can choose to set it to record in continuous mode or in voice-activated mode to capture sounds in a 15 feet range (360 degrees).
In voice-activated mode, the ultra-performant sensor of the microphone will initiate ad start recording only when sounds are detected in the range of the recorder (15 feet) thus avoiding recording long silent periods and saving memory time.
The built-in Li-Po 3.7 V battery (240 mAh) needs only 1.5 hours to fully charge (DC IN 5 V 500mA), even when connected to a computer and will be up and running for more than 24 hours.
Record the entire day then just plug & play all your recordings. 
*no additional software needed
 TileRec can also record while charging so you will not miss any information that matters to you.
Let’s get nostalgic for a hot second. Reflect on a childhood memory, recalling an exact time or event — what you were wearing, who you were with, the sights, smells, tastes. Try to remember how you felt, specific noises like, I don’t know, shrilling crickets layered under siblings’ laughter or, the sound of your mother's voice.
It’s difficult, right? Unless the event was recorded, the memory is likely pretty hazy.  
TileRec is designed to record your daily meetings, activities, and ideas in a non-intrusive way and carries our belief that “wear-ability” is the utmost goal in the design of everyday carry technology. 
You live in a fast-paced world where TIME is MONEY and you are searching for the best tool to improve productivity and save time?  
 Here are  some situations  TileRec can help you with:  
The perfect solution for professional use
Lawyers may use them to take voice notes while preparing cases, while criminal investigators record digital notes in the field, and doctors use it to record important info about cases. If you make a living in one of these fields, you may find a portable voice recorder invaluable.  
Using a voice recorder has never been easier. 
So why not take the leap into the digital era? Stop wasting time and paper trying to keep track of all the information. 
Just slide one button to record and enjoy the Tilerec experience.
Use the USB cord to connect your TileRec to any computer and select the audio file you need to playback.  It's just that simple: 
PLAY

Check on Soundcloud the audio sample recorder with TileRec.
The Li-Po built-in battery of TileRec is re-chargeable for more than 1000 charging cycles. It takes only 1.5 hours to fully charge the battery, then it can record continuously or in voice-activated mode, for more than 24 hours. 
Have you ever wondered how much paper we use yearly? 
Americans use 85,000,000 tons of paper a year; about 680 pounds per person. The average household throws away 13,000 separate pieces of paper each year. 
Using TileRec for your daily notes and meetings saves time, effort and also 1 tree/ person/ year from becoming paper. 
All this while increasing productivity, saving time and keeping all your information organized with time and date stamp!

 Find a reward that works for you and your family, office or team, there's something for everyone.  We are particularly excited to offer fast shipping in the US and EU.
 This is ATTO DIGITAL's  2nd product launched via crowdfunding.  We always deliver. We've learned a ton over our first Kickstarter, helping develop a good sense of our capabilities and timeline.
The satisfaction of our users is paramount!
That is why we want to make sure that when you enter the ATTO  family you feel the care and support.
Our Customer Service team is  24/7 available to offer support in more than 5 languages. And because we really do believe in the manufacturing quality of our recorders, we offer lifetime warranty for TileRec.
We, the ATTO DIGITAL team, have more than 10 years of combined experience in designing, producing and selling sound recorders and surveillance equipment.
Download Press Kit 
Our mission and passion are to listen, so it is also paramount for us to listen to our customers' feedback to better understand how the ideal mini voice recorder should be. 
 Our team is ready - so is the manufacturing - now we just need you! 
It has been a long adventure. From brainstorming to product design, engineering, and branding, it has been a trying, monumental amount of time, conviction and expertise.
It has been a stressful, exciting and thrilling experience to design a product from scratch. We want you to be part of our experience! 
This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1000+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $430M raised between them.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have been working non-stop the for last 3 years developing this product and we feel that the amount we are trying to raise is realistic with what is needed for fulfilling the project. We know that the Kickstarter journey is a long one and that there might be several surprises along the way - including foul weather, or maybe even (shock!) our phones running out of battery.

Unfortunately, there are always risks involved in getting a product from the prototype phase to the market, but we have done everything possible to minimize these risks for our backers. Extensive planning has gone into the costs needed for raw materials, labor and shipping and we feel confident we will be able to meet our outlined delivery goals.

Our biggest challenge is the timely delivery of all of our components. In order to keep TileRec at such a small size, parts must be assembled simultaneously, meaning if one shipment gets delayed, our entire process may get slowed down. Hopefully, everything goes according to plan, but if not, we have multiple suppliers for each component, always ready with a plan B!

The second biggest concern is quality control. While we are using the best manufacturer in China who was the previous supplier for one of the top international consumer electronic brands, we need to inspect each TileRec to guarantee 100% satisfaction. This dedication to detail is time-consuming, yet necessary to ensure a quality product.

We promise to keep all of our backers informed if anything happens or our timeline changes! If we encounter anything that might affect the product, its development, and/or shipping date, we will make sure to notify you about it with frequent updates. This project is our #1 priority and we will do everything we can to bring the TileRec to its full potential.

campaign.story:
Making a Custom Sized Level Up
When you buy a level up, it will come with four corner pieces and two side pieces.  You can increase the width of the Level Up by buying extra Centre Tiles – but make sure you buy enough extra side pieces to finish your table.  You can purchase extras by viewing the Add On Menu on the page below.  
Some common sizes
The 2x4 Level Up (A 24 inch by 48 inch rectangle)
The 3x3 Level Up (A 36 inch square)
The 3x4 Level Up (A 36 inch by 48 inch rectangle)
The 4x6 Level Up (A 48 inch by 72 inch rectangle – for wargamers)
Ready To Level Up Your Game Night?
As fans of board, card and role-playing games, we often struggled on game nights to fit everything we needed onto our table. How do you fit character sheets, game cards, the main board, figures, dice and tokens on to a table that is also playing host to drinks, snacks, the compulsory game night pizza and a myriad of other items?
We have found the solution to your board game frustrations... the Level Up - a lightweight, portable, tabletop extension that raises the main playing surface, whilst still allowing plenty of space underneath for all your game night necessities!
Dimensions
Level Up is made up of 6 tiles which each measure 12" square (30.48cm). The whole platform, when constructed, measures 24" (60.96 cm) by 36" (91.44cm) and stands at just over 6 inches from the table (16cm) – when complete, the playing area is just a little over A1 in size - further extension pieces are available in the stretch goals.
Each 12" square tile has been designed with reinforced rib supports to enable the level up to carry weight up to even the heaviest game pieces or the odd rogue cat. The Level Up has been tested by our engineers to 5kg (11lbs).

We have chosen metal for the legs for durability and strength but also so that they can be made as thin as possible, so as not to interrupt your view of the items underneath the Level Up. To ensure durability, threaded metal inserts have been added to the underside of each tile to provide proper thread engagement for the legs to be inserted into.
The design of the Level Up allows for the legs to be attached as close to the center of the surface as possible. This clears the underneath space for your character sheets and attached cards, dice, pencils as well as the ever-present danger of drinks. If stability is a worry, each tile will have three threaded metal inserts so that the legs can be attached as close in or as far out as you require.

How Sturdy Is It?
There have been a lot of questions regarding the question of stability of the Level Up.  We're pleased to say it's been tested to hold 5kg (11lbs)!  If you want to make it even sturdier you can add extra legs by adding to your pledge.  Please see the "Add On Menu" below!  
PLAY


  Every Level Up Comes With: 
(6) Board Tiles 
(6) Legs 
(1) Canvas Tote bag
Where table space is at a real premium and the games are competing for the same space with all the yummy fare that you are selling. Well, now your customers can have their cake and eat it whilst still playing their favorite game (other food items are available).
Whether you are interested in level Up to use in the cafe or for your shop, please get in touch and we will send you a retail price list.
As well as creating the Level Up as a 6-piece, standalone product, we have some great add ons that will enhance the product.  Most came about as a direct response to suggestions supplied by you during our pre-launch campaign so thank you for that!

 Here's how add ons work.  Pick out your add on below.  Add that amount to your pledge.  For example.  Let's say you want the map clips and the upgraded bag.  Before we ship the product we will email you a survey and confirm your add ons and give you the opportunity to add more if you like.  
Add £4 / $5 to your pledge and get a set of 6 plastic board clips.  Perfect for anyone using a battle mat or any rolled up surface.  Say goodbye to the days of having to weigh down the edges for a flat and smooth playing surface.
 Add £4 / $5 to your pledge and receive a set of 6 extra legs.  Perfect for those who want to add extra stability to their board.  
Add £12 / $15 to your pledge and get a set of 2 middle extension pieces and 2 extra legs. Perfect for those long gaming nights.  No pun intended.
Making a Custom Sized Level Up
When you buy a level up, it will come with four corner pieces and two side pieces.  You can increase the width of the Level Up by buying extra Centre Tiles – but make sure you buy enough extra side pieces to finish your table.
Some common sizes

The 3x3 Level Up (A 36 inch square)

The 4x6 Level Up (A 48 inch by 72 inch rectangle – for wargamers)

Shipping will be collected after the campaign and not until we send a survey to collect your shipping information.  We do ship EU friendly as well.  The $15 flat price is for one Classic Level Up.  If you buy multiple units or add ons we will pull your zip code specifically and give you a custom quote to save you on shipping.

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The Level Up has been designed, a prototype produced and tested, and a manufacturer sourced. We are ready to begin the manufacture of Level Up, all we need now is you to help us make this concept a real success.

This project has real potential to be massive. That being said, the bigger the project, the more links there are in the chain. With every additional link, there could be additional problems waiting to ambush the smooth planning of this project.

Whilst we hope no problems will occur IF something was to happen, we can assure you that we will do all we can to mitigate any delay. Some difficulties, however much we might want to help, will be outside of our control. Industrial action, acts of god, fire and flood, ash clouds from volcanoes as well as plague and pestilence are just some of the issues and problems that might occur that we have no control over. 

We have, however, already added in ‘stretch’ room, additional time for each section of the project to be completed and will keep the delivery dates and other deadlines updated on the KS page as well as through our development blog and social media channels. We will work hard to ensure all your queries are answered in a timely fashion.

To be honest and upfront is at the core of our Kickstarter Project. We have chosen a superb team to support us in this project who want this game to become as much a reality as we do. This being said many of our team are sub-contractors working for several clients at the same time. Sometimes this leads to parts of our production process working slower than we had planned or forecast. If this happens, we will let you, the most important people in this project, know what has happened and what we intend on doing about it.

In essence we commit to keeping our backers updated to any changes or developments when they happen.

updates.update_content:
Hi Folks
It seems from the comments and messages we are receiving that some of you are not getting the update emails we are sending out. We have just emailed the latest update for pre-orders and we are posting it here for people who don't get our emails.
RE: LevelUp pre & new order deliveries

As many of you know, CRWN are currently completing the fulfillment of the Level Up. They took over very much at the last minute when our previous company (and the one we had been working closely with for 6 months planning fulfillment) suddenly came to a grinding halt because of Covid.
We are extremely grateful for CRWN volunteering to take on a job that was landed on them, with no warning, in the middle of a pandemic. We were so impressed with them that we are now having them handle all our new e-commerce through our brand new website and they will also be handling our future Kickstarter fulfilment.

A quick update on the current status of deliveries. These details effect backers from our Kickstarter campaign. Pre-order fulfilment will begin in regions as soon as the main fulfillment has been completed.
USA - The fulfilment for the US have been completed save for a handful of large wargamers that are leaving the warehouse this week. We are now dealing with the redeliveries and any lost packages.

For those who are still awaiting the delivery of their Level up, thank you very much for your continued patience.
US/Canada/UK
In the US and UK we have completed the fulfilment except for a few who we are aware of and with whom were are in contact with. If you are in the US/Canada/UK and you have not yet received a tracking number nor have you been contacted by us, please email and we will be able to chase your package personally. If we are already in touch with you then please rest assured we are on it.

Having now received the majority of reports from test packages, we can see that apart from a few occasions when the courier didn’t read the label correctly, most packages are being delivered with no extra charges.
This means that from next week the fulfilment for Europe will begin. This process will take a number of weeks and will be done in country order. The first country to report back was France and they have been queued up to be sent first. The next step for anyone in Europe will be when you receive your tracking number. Nest week, once France has been completed, we will post back up here to give an idea of country order for the remaining packages.

As some of you would have seen from the comments on the Kickstarter page, it seems the first of the parcels are being received in France and we have received an email stating a Level Up is due to be delivered tomorrow to a backer in Italy.
France
As we know that parcels to France will not be levied with any further charges, we have authorised the labels to be printed for the French fulfillment, which consists of some 700 plus packages. If we receive positive confirmation from Italy tomorrow, we will release the shipments for Italy.

updates.update_userinfo: Staggered Delivery and Projected Completion Date
updates.update_content:
Having read comments from people who are yet to receive their Level Up, we can fully understand everyone keenness to get their package. Especially as they are being so well received.
Despite the delays caused by the pandemic and Brexit, deliveries of the Level Up were always going to be strung over many months, as this was the delivery option we decided upon. Our first fulfilment company wanted to wait until the final container had been delivered to a central holding site and then fulfil all orders over a period of three to four weeks beginning this coming April (sending out approx 5,000 packages a week).

updates.update_userinfo: For everyone receiving their Level Up packages
updates.update_content:
It is really encouraging to read all the amazing comments from all the people who have received their Level Up packages and even some who have already been able to give them a go.
I am missing tiles in my order.
We are receiving quite a number of emails where backers are concerned that they have not received all of the tiles that they had ordered. In almost all of the cases, the order is correct but there has been some confusion as to what an original Level Up should consist of, and so below is a look at the five retail boxes most orders are receiving.

updates.update_userinfo: UK- deliveries are starting right now
updates.update_content:
Many thanks to the our UK backers, who are letting us know that their Level Up's are finally arriving at their destinations.  As restrictions look likely to begin to lift in the UK- it means that using these beauties will soon be on the cards.  We look forward to seeing pictures of your first games at help@spidermindgames.co.uk
If you have any problems with your level up do contact us at the above email too.
We will continue to update you when we have information to give you.

Hi Folks, 
This week is an exciting week as we will see a large amount of movement after what has seemed an eternity of waiting.
UK & Europe
After a great deal of fiddling about on UK vs European postage rates we are ready to begin fulfilment in the UK and the test group into Europe. The next step, sometime this week will be for tracking numbers to start to be sent out. If you are not in the first tranche rest assured, we won’t have forgotten you and you will get you number and item. Please check spam folders as the number often ends up there.

campaign.story:
Previews
Game Rules
Click here to open the game rules (beta version):
And here are the rules videos: 
Play the Game
Play the game using the Tabletopia Game Room:
Or watch the gameplay video by Richard Ham:
Social Goals
During the course of this campaign you have participated in three Social Goal events, adding 17 new images and one Kickstarter exclusive component to every pledge (please note that we can't edit the 'Rewards' category during the campaign, that is why the descriptions do not list the Earth metal coin). 
But you can still help us to promote this project! Please like, comment and share these social media posts:
Facebook: http://bit.ly/2OiL6oD
Twitter: http://bit.ly/2RVEyyp
Instagram: http://bit.ly/2RSx52V
Thank you!
Production and Delivery
The game will be published if we reach the funding goal: £40.000. The design is complete, with 2 years of development and playtesting behind it. Miniature sculpts and artwork are ready. During this campaign there will be no rule-changing expansions and stretch goals. We are offering a great product at a great price and a short fulfillment period. There is no hidden agenda. We are offering a great and simple deal: short campaign, instant production, swift delivery!
The games are produced in the EU, in keeping with the proven high standards of PHALANX. If you back us on Kickstarter, you will receive your copy several weeks before the game reaches any retail outlets! Our goal is to produce Martin Wallace’s Rocketmen within 180 days of reaching our funding goal. Kickstarter backers will have their copies delivered no later than October 2020.
Please note that the graphic materials presented here are not yet final and may be changed. The photos are of handmade prototypes of the game. The final production quality will be much, much higher.
Rocket-fast Shipping
You will be asked to pay the shipping cost in the Pledge Manager after the campaign. At that time, you will be able to add extra copies of the game and items from our add-on list. Additional items may increase shipping costs. PHALANX is responsible for shipping the English, German and Polish editions of the game. The games will be shipped from the EU using FedEx air freight, so the delivery date will be close to the production date.
The estimated shipping cost (regardless of the Pledge level) is: USA £15 to most states, £30 to Alaska, Hawaii, and Puerto Rico. Canada £20. EU £12 to most countries (Poland - free). Other European countries £15 - £30. Asia £30, Australia £25, New Zealand £25, Oceania £35, Latin America £35, Africa £35. 
You can multiply the chosen Pledge to get significant savings on shipping costs. For example, the cost of shipping to most EU countries will be £12 for a single game and £20-36 for 2-4 games, if shipped to the same address. Call your friends and save on shipping!
International Distribution
If you're a retailer, please contact us at sales[at]vertima.trade to receive an offer.
Media
Backing the game is a great way to support the project, but the next best thing you could do is to help us create awareness for the game by following us and sharing our posts on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and elsewhere.
Please subscribe to our newsletter (https://phalanxgames.co.uk/contact.html) to be the first to know about our future releases.
This project is Kicktraq Day-1 Project. If you love charts (yes, we do), please visit: 
Refund Policy
Please read the information on this page carefully and back the game only if you are sure that you want to get it. We are sure that you won’t regret it, as our previous projects have received great feedback from the community. Nevertheless, sometimes unforeseen things happen and you will need a refund. In such cases we will refund your pledge, but without 15% fees that we are obliged to pay (Kickstarter, Stripe, PayPal, and BackerKit fees).
GDPR and Data/Privacy Protection law

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We do not expect delays in production, but unforeseen issues may arise during manufacturing and shipping. We estimate that in the worst case scenario, the production might suffer delays of at most 30-60 days, and shipping & customs may add an extra 15-45 days. We are experienced with large production runs, and we are preparing back-up plans for each step of the project, from production to shipping and final delivery.

By backing this project you agree that our primary responsibility to you is to ship your order as entered into the pledge management system. You are responsible for import or other duties that may be payable to relevant tax authorities. You also accept that you are fully liable for incorrect shipping details and will risk your pledge being undeliverable or lost in transit. We are unable to ship to PO Boxes. We allow a maximum of one delivery location per backer, regardless of the number of pledges/copies ordered.

Please note that geopolitical events not under our control, such as Brexit and the imposition of new tariffs on the access of goods to a country, may change the terms we offer to residents of such countries, even if we guarantee we will do our best to avoid such issues.

If you do not accept the proposed terms, then please do not back this project; wait for the retail release.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Hello Everyone!
We hope you’re doing well, enjoying the first days of summer and staying safe, especially in areas affected by recent heatwaves – such as the one we’re having in Poland right now.

The French Edition

Hello Everyone!

Most shipments of the game have already reached backers and we are extremely curious about one thing... has anyone managed to build a base on Mars and win against the automata on the hardest level yet?

Shipments
We are still receiving information from some backers that their shipment has not yet arrived. Those living in the United Kingdom need to be patient - shipments are made from the European Union, and due to Brexit, customs clearance of shipments from outside the United Kingdom takes a significant amount of time. We are unable to expedite this process, it is completely out of our hands. However, the good news is that backers from the UK don't have to worry about any additional charges for this.

updates.update_userinfo: That’s one small step for a PHALANX, one giant leap for the backers

Hello Everyone!

We hope everyone is well and remains safe in these uncertain times.
The day of the start of the shipments is near. In the pictures below you can see the final boxes of  three language versions (the others are also almost ready), which we have checked to be sure, and we haven't caught any errors. This means that the process of completion will not be interrupted, and shipments to backers will start soon - probably next week. By the end of March, the first games should already be with the backers.

updates.update_userinfo: The conquest of space is imminent
updates.update_content:
Hello Space Pioneers!

Preparations for the final phase of the project are going well. The last components are still on their way, so packing will probably start at the end of February, which gives us hope that shipments to backers will start as previously announced - in the middle of March. It is worth bearing in mind that weather conditions and restrictions may affect the final work and so this may slip slightly into late March. We believe that the whole shipping process will be completed as early as April.

Hello Everyone!

I hope the new year brings lots of good things for everyone - including great games.
We are currently waiting for the last shipment of components, which should arrive early next month. If there are no delays, we can optimistically assume that we will start packing games in mid-February. If all goes well, shipments to backers will start in late February or early March. However, if there is a delay in any of these activities, or if work progresses more slowly than anticipated, the delivery date may be slightly delayed.

Hello Everyone!

I hope that you are all keeping safe and healthy.
This year there have been many adversities, but finally the journey of the ready-made, final figurines has begun. Although it will still take a few more weeks for them to reach us, this is good news - especially as these are some of the most demanding, long-lasting components that manufacturers have developed over time. The choice of colours, the right shapes - we had to redesign them many times, and make changes in order to finally get the perfect product to make space exploration a thematic experience.
